name: Cloth Garb

When he finishes his dialogue he will turn hostile, and defeating him will grant the player Blaidd's Armor, Blaidd's Gauntlets, and Blaidd's Greaves (as well as the Royal Greatsword).  Video Location
name: Blaidd's Armor

hint: Purchased from the Enia in Roundtable Hold after defeating Elemer of the Briar in The Shaded Castle.

hint: Purchased from the Enia in Roundtable Hold after defeating Elemer of the Briar in The Shaded Castle
name: Briar Gauntlets

hint: You can find the Night's Cavalry Set within the Consecrated Snowfield: From the Inner Consecrated Snowfield site of grace at night, look southwest and there will be a caravan being pulled by two giants and two Night's Cavalry escorts. Kill both the escorts to receive the armor alongside an Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone. See the location in the Elden Ring Map
name: Night's Cavalry Helm

hint: You can find the Night's Cavalry Set within the Consecrated Snowfield: From the Inner Consecrated Snowfield site of grace at night, look southwest and there will be a caravan being pulled by two giants and two Night's Cavalry escorts. Kill both the escorts to receive the armor alongside an Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone. See the location in the Elden Ring Map
name: Night's Cavalry Gauntlets

hint: Can be bought from Finger Reader Enia, at Roundtable Hold after defeating Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree for  6,000.
name: Royal Knight Armor

hint: Can be brought from Finger Reader Enia, at Roundtable Hold after defeating Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree for  4,000.
name: Royal Knight Gauntlets

hint: Pieces of the Nox Swordstress Set are dropped by the Nox Swordstresses found in Nokron and Nokstella.  Three can be found in relatively close proximity to the Nokstella, Eternal City site of grace. One up the stairs in a side room, and 2 in the river riding Giant Ants.
name: Nox Swordstress Armor

hint: Pieces of the Night Maiden Set are dropped by Night Maiden enemies found in Nokron and Nokstella.  Two can be found in the Night's Sacred Ground area in the church with the large Sphere Silver Tear. Once this building's shortcut is opened, these two can be easily farmed by resetting at the Night's Sacred Ground site of grace.
name: Night Maiden Twin Crown

hint: All pieces of the Fur Set drop from Ancestral Follower enemies.  The pieces will drop off both the spectral and normal enemies of this type.  They can easily be found in Ruined Labyrinth and Mausoleum Compound areas of Liurnia of the Lakes.  You will have a hard time missing them, and vice-versa, in Siofra River.  Video Location
name: Fur Raiment

hint: Guardian Set pieces can be acquired as drops from Erdtree Guardians that are found near Minor Erdtrees in the Lands Between.       An area dense with Guardians can be found by starting at the Dragonbarrow Fork site of grace, and working your way uphill towards the Minor Erdtree. Guardians are encountered in small groups and more come up from the ground, making it a good place to farm the set.    Chance it drops from one of the multiple Erdtree Guardians at the minor tree in Weeping Peninsula.
name: Guardian Mask

hint: Drops from the Guardians with large flowers found near the Erdtree Sanctuary site of grace, in Leyndell Royal Capital.  Does NOT currently drop from the blooming Guardians near the Minor Erdtree Church.
name: Guardian Garb (Full Bloom)

hint: Drops from Lesser Cleanrot Knights, found at Inner Aeonia and Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.
name: Cleanrot Helm

hint: Drops from Lesser Cleanrot Knights in Inner Aeonia, Caelid.
name: Cleanrot Armor

hint: Pieces of the Fire Monk Set are dropped by Fire Monks found in camps in western Liurnia of the Lakes, around Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir, and around Guardians' Garrison in the Mountaintops of the Giants.
name: Fire Monk Hood

hint: Pieces of the Fire Monk Set are dropped by Fire Monks found in camps in western Liurnia of the Lakes, around Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir, and around Guardians' Garrison in the Mountaintops of the Giants.
name: Fire Monk Armor

hint: Around the Bestial Sanctum and Farum Greatbridge sites of grace.
name: Vulgar Militia Armor

hint: Around the Bestial Sanctum and Farum Greatbridge sites of grace.
name: Vulgar Militia Gauntlets

hint: Can be found in Stillwater Cave - Liurnia of the Lakes, just ahead and below the Lake Facing Cliffs, it's all sitting on a poison submerged corpse near the entrance, guarded by Giant Bats that will attack you when you take it.
name: Sage Robe

hint: Available from Enia at Roundtable Hold after defeating Godfrey, First Elden Lord and Hoarah Loux, Warrior.
name: Elden Lord Armor

hint: This becomes available for purchase for 20,000 Runes from Enia after you defeat Mohg, Lord of Blood.
name: Lord of Blood's Robe

hint: Defeat the Godskin Noble found on the bridge that connects the study hall to the Divine Tower of Liurnia.
name: Godskin Noble Hood

hint: Dropped by Godskin Noble Bossfight.
name: Godskin Noble Bracelets

hint: The entire All-Knowing Set is dropped by Sir Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing upon defeat. Sir Gideon is encountered as a boss in Leyndell, Ashen Capital, an alternate version of the Royal Capital accessible only after making significant progress in the story.
name: All-Knowing Armor

hint: The entire All-Knowing Set is dropped by Sir Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing upon defeat. Sir Gideon is encountered as a boss in Leyndell, Ashen Capital, an alternate version of the Royal Capital accessible only after making significant progress in the story.
name: All-Knowing Gauntlets

hint: Earliest location: Limgrave East upon killing D, Hunter of the Dead.   Obtained at end of D, Hunter of the Dead's questline.
name: Twinned Armor

hint: Earliest location: Limgrave East upon killing D, Hunter of the Dead.   Obtained at end of D, Hunter of the Dead's questline.
name: Twinned Gauntlets

hint: Obtained from Brother Corhyn, alongside a Flail and Corhyn's Bell Bearing, in Leyndell, Ashen Capital, at the end of Goldmask's questline. Exhaust his dialogue, the reload the area to find the items.       If you offered him the Tonic of Forgetfulness while he's at the bridge near the Stargazer's Ruins, he will remain at that spot. Return to the area after finishing Crumbling Farum Azula, and pick up these items from where he was.    If you didn't complete the Law of Regression puzzle of the questline before reaching Crumbling Farum Azula, these items will be found where he was last seen.    These items are also obtained by killing him after he leaves the Roundtable Hold.
name: Corhyn's Robe

hint: Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave: The entire set is dropped by the Ancient Hero of Zamor Boss at the end of this dungeon.
name: Zamor Armor

hint: Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave: The entire Zamor Set is dropped by the Ancient Hero of Zamor fought at the end of this dungeon.
name: Zamor Bracelets

hint: Chance to drop from imps found in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds:       From the Underground Roadside site of grace, go south through the shortcut door. This room has long-tongued Imps that can drop the Imp Head (Long-Tongued) hiding everywhere above the sewer pipes.
name: Imp Head (Long-Tongued)

hint: Leyndell, Royal Capital: From the East Capital Rampart site of grace  take the stair to the west and head south, jump down to the right over the golden roofs, and then down again, beware the enemies, there are two dark passages that head east take the left one, you may collect the Golden Rune (9), jump down to the left and there will be a corpse sitting there with the item on it.   Alternatively, start at the Avenue Balcony site of grace and take the stair to the southeast, onto the main road running through the city. Follow the road northeast until you reach the large door at the eastern edge of the city and turn right, then head south along the wall until you reach the item.  Video Location
name: Imp Head (Corpse)

hint: Given to the player by Iron Fist Alexander. Follow his questline until you find him in Mt. Gelmir near Seethewater Terminus. Completing his dialogue here will award the player with the Jar.
name: Jar

hint: Given by Nepheli Loux, who's at the Roundtable Hold.  Her initial location is inside a room near the Secluded Cell Site of Grace in Stormveil Castle. It's near the golden fog door that leads to Godrick the Grafted. When you find her, you must exhaust her dialogue so that she tells you that you can call her via a summoning sign to help you battle Godrick.  Nepheli moves to the Roundtable Hold after defeating Godrick, and you can find her at the northeast side, inside the library. Simply speak to her and she'll give you the talisman.   Altus Tunnel: In the second cavern, head through the tunnel in the south to find a wooden balcony overlooking a pit. Drop down on the left side to an overgrown root below. Follow the root going upwards to reach an upper balcony above where you can loot the talisman from a corpse.
name: Arsenal Charm

hint: Given by Nepheli Loux, who's at the Roundtable Hold.  Her initial location is inside a room near the Secluded Cell Site of Grace in Stormveil Castle. It's near the golden fog door that leads to Godrick the Grafted. When you find her, you must exhaust her dialogue so that she tells you that you can call her via a summoning sign to help you battle Godrick.  Nepheli moves to the Roundtable Hold after defeating Godrick, and you can find her at the northeast side, inside the library. Simply speak to her and she'll give you the talisman.   Altus Tunnel: In the second cavern, head through the tunnel in the south to find a wooden balcony overlooking a pit. Drop down on the left side to an overgrown root below. Follow the root going upwards to reach an upper balcony above where you can loot the talisman from a corpse.
name: Arsenal Charm +1

hint: Where to find Great-Jar's Arsenal:   Reward for completing the The Great-Jar's challenge of defeating three NPC duelists in Dragonbarrow (northern Caelid).  You must kill all three NPC duelists in one life; dying will make it so you have to start from the first duelist again. You can access this area by coming up from Siofra Deep River Well in the underground.       This area can also be accessed by climbing the roots above the large crystal at the bottom of the valley. However, this is most likely unintentional.      Obtaining this talisman while playing online results in player's build being uploaded to the Elden Ring server to be used as randomized Knight of the Great Jar for other players.  When you talk to the Great-Jar, he will only respond with "..."  After talking to him, three red summon signs appear to summon three Knights of the Great-Jar.       In two of the four corners of the "arena", there are narrow rock outcroppings. Crouching or blocking in these spots will often cause the NPCs to fall off of the cliff as they attack. This is especially useful when sequence-breaking into this area with a low-level character.    Consider killing the closer of the two archer golems, as he will shoot arrows at you and disrupt your fights.
name: Great-Jar's Arsenal

hint: Base talisman:  Fringefolk Hero's Grave: To get there, use two Stonesword Keys on the double Imp Keystone next to the Stranded Graveyard Site of Grace. This will lead to a mini-dungeon with traps. Head down until you see the path narrow on both sides and drop drown at the edge to get access to the secret area. Proceed past the imps and a fire trap to find the item resting at an altar. Two Grafted Scions wait hanging above, so be sure to avoid them when they land and grab it really quickly.  +1 Variant: Subterranean Shunning-Grounds: Can be found in a chest, in the boss room after the boss fight with Mohg, the Omen. You do not have to defeat Mohg to loot the chest. You can acquire this mid-fight.Video Location  +2 Variant: Leyndell, Ashen Capital: Found on top of a branch jutting out of the ground in a large courtyard, guarded by three Lesser Ulcerated Tree Spirits. Fast travel to the Forbidden Lands Site of Grace, and take the elevator back up to the city. Exit the west door, then fight past a knight and few soldiers, and continue down the stairs, then take the large wooden elevator down. You will arrive at a landing overlooking the courtyard, where the beasts and this talisman is located. You can avoid the beasts by hugging the left wall.  Video Location
name: Erdtree's Favor

hint: Fort Gael (nearest Site of Grace: Fort Gael North): Looted from a chest in the fort. It's outside the watchtower on the upper section, under a canopy tent.
name: Starscourge Heirloom

hint: Found on a body lying at the top of the Divine Tower of Liurnia.  You will need the Carian Inverted Statue in order to obtain this talisman.  Video Location
name: Stargazer Heirloom

hint: Can be found in the basement of the Purified Ruins in Southeast Liurnia of the Lakes, whose entrance is hidden under some boards, in a chest.
name: Two Fingers Heirloom

hint: Dropped by the Cleanrot Knight (Sickle) & Cleanrot Knight (Spear) dual boss found in the Abandoned Cave. It can be accessed by going east from the Smoldering Wall Site of Grace, and walking across the canyon by using tree branches.
name: Golden Scarab

hint: Found in a chest underneath a massive throne in Nokstella, Eternal City.  The chest is in the highest room of the city, guarded by two mimic tears and a Nox warrior.  Video Location
name: Moon of Nokstella

hint: Base talisman: Uld Palace Ruins in northeastern Liurnia of the Lakes: Go to the Mausoleum Compound and head north up the incline, then turn West as soon as you pass the horizontal rocks to your left. Proceed forward to the large vertical rock formation. There will be a smaller vertical rock formation on your right. Walk around the larger formation counter-clockwise until you see a hole in the wall. Go through it and you will find the talisman on a corpse to your left overhanging a cliff.+1 variant: Can be found in the southwestern area of Consecrated Snowfield, southeast of Yelough Anix Tunnel entrance. Alternatively, go straight southwest from the Inner Consecrated Snowfield Site of Grace. It is located on a corpse slumped over a log, and is guarded by Ancestral Follower and Ancestral Follower Shaman whose singing can be heard once you are nearby.
name: Stalwart Horn Charm

hint: Base talisman: Uld Palace Ruins in northeastern Liurnia of the Lakes: Go to the Mausoleum Compound and head north up the incline, then turn West as soon as you pass the horizontal rocks to your left. hint: Base talisman: Found on one of the corpses in an ant nest in Ainsel River.  +1 Variant: Found in the Lake of Rot, as a guaranteed item drop from the Ancestral Follower southeast of the Lake of Rot Shoreside Site of Grace.
name: Immunizing Horn Charm

hint: Base talisman: Found on one of the corpses in an ant nest in Ainsel River.  +1 Variant: Found in the Lake of Rot, as a guaranteed item drop from the Ancestral Follower southeast of the Lake of Rot Shoreside Site of Grace.
name: Immunizing Horn Charm +1

hint: Located in Lux Ruins, in a chest after defeating the boss, Demi-Human Queen Gilika.
name: Ritual Sword Talisman

hint: Dropped by Recusant Henricus, located north of Warmaster's Shack, and northeast of Stormhill Shack.
name: Hammer Talisman

hint: Stillwater Cave: Dropped by the Cleanrot Knight boss upon defeat.
name: Winged Sword Insignia

hint: Earned after choosing to assist Millicent and successfully defeat her sisters.
name: Rotten Winged Sword Insignia

hint: From the Stormhill Shack Site of Grace in Limgrave, travel southeast to Stormhill Evergaol. There's a tower nearby, toward the north-east. Dispatch the guards inside, enter the doorway, and open the chest on the left side of the room for the talisman.
name: Arrow's Reach Talisman

hint: Castle Morne: From the Behind the Castle Site of Grace, drop down to the western end of the castle and follow the path along the outer walls. There is a tower section of the walls in the westernmost corner. Climb up the ladder and go around the tower to find a chest where the talisman can be found.
name: Twinblade Talisman

hint: Found in a cellar underneath the Mistwood Ruins in eastern Limgrave.
name: Axe Talisman

hint: Located in a chest on the top of the tower directly above the Impassable Greatbridge site of grace, in front of Redmane Castle, in Caelid.
name: Arrow's Sting Talisman

hint: Drops from Esgar, Priest of Blood in Leyndell Catacombs.  Video Location
name: Lord of Blood's Exultation

hint: Located at Stormveil Castle, on a corpse situated on a watchtower.Go to the Rampart Tower Site of Grace and exit the door that leads outside.Look right, and jump down onto the rooftop where there's a destroyed pillar.Jump on the pillar, climb up it, and then jump onto the small ledge nearest it.You'll be on a platform of sorts; follow it around the edge of the building, and as you turn the corner you'll see a ladder.Reaching it will be your goal, however note that there are three enemies standing to your left waiting to ambush you from a raised platform, and a fourth "playing dead" to your right.With them defeated, climb the ladder in front of you. Upon reaching the top, you'll see several birds, and in the right corner, a corpse.Loot the corpse to receive the Claw Talisman.
name: Claw Talisman

hint: By Stormveil Cliffside Site of Grace in Stormveil Castle: Go up the stairs on the side of the castle, and up to the third floor of the wine cellar. Enter the door on the eastern wall to find a dark room with a Banished Knight, as well as a chest with this talisman.
name: Curved Sword Talisman

hint: Found in a Carriage chest, east of the Erdtree-Gazing Hill site of grace. Watch out for the three fire-arrow balistae guarding the carriage.
name: Greatshield Talisman

hint: In the first locked imp's room at the beginning of the dungeon in Sainted Hero's Grave, in Altus Plateau.
name: Crimson Seed Talisman

hint: It can be found in the rafters of the Carian Study Hall, next to a body.
name: Cerulean Seed Talisman

hint: Dropped by Rileigh the Idle, the enemy you kill during the second assassination task in the Volcano Manor questline.  Video Location
name: Crepus's Vial

hint: Purchased from War Counselor Iji as part of Blaidd's questline.        After killing the Bloodhound Knight Darriwil for Blaidd, the player can tell War Counselor Iji that Blaidd sent them. Iji will then stock the item.    Becomes available to purchase from War Counselor Iji after talking to Ranni and her servants at Ranni's Rise for the the first time.      Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after offering Iji's Bell Bearing
name: Carian Filigreed Crest

hint: Past the graveyard section of Raya Lucaria Academy, simply ride the lift down. Looted off a corpse that can be found at the bottom section of the large rotating lift.  Nearest Site of Grace: Schoolhouse Classroom.
name: Longtail Cat Talisman

hint: Received from Melina after resting at a Site of Grace beyond the tutorial area.
name: Spectral Steed Whistle

hint: Can be purchased from the Isolated Merchant in Weeping Peninsula for  1800 Runes.   Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Liurnia of the Lakes for   1800 Runes.
name: Lantern

hint: The Blasphemous Claw is dropped by Recusant Bernahl upon defeat at Crumbling Farum Azula.  Video Location
name: Blasphemous Claw

hint: Leyndell Royal Capital: Found all the way down in Subterranean Shunning-Grounds, guarded by 2 Giant Crayfish.  Video location
name: Mohg's Shackle

hint: Prattling Pate "Hello" can be found in Stormfoot Catacombs on a corpse, behind the first pillar that exudes fire.   Prattling Pate "Thank you"  Prattling Pate "Apologies"  Prattling Pate "Wonderful"  Prattling Pate "Please help"  Prattling Pate "Let's get to it"  Prattling Pate "You're beautiful"  Prattling Pate "My Beloved"
name: Prattling Pate Hello

hint: Prattling Pate "Thank You" can be found inside the Tombsward Catacombs, on a corpse at the end of the main path, past the flame-throwing pillar.   Prattling Pate "Hello"  Prattling Pate "Apologies"  Prattling Pate "Wonderful"  Prattling Pate "Please help"  Prattling Pate "Let's get to it"  Prattling Pate "You're beautiful"  Prattling Pate "My Beloved"
name: Prattling Pate Thank you

hint: Found on a corpse in the second-to-last level of the Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel, inside an opening in the north.
name: Shatter Earth

hint: Can be found in the chest at the top of the Converted Fringe Tower in the Liurnia of the Lakes region. It requires the Erudition gesture to unlock: Give Thops the Academy Glintstone Key (Used to gain access to Converted Towers)
name: Gavel of Haima

hint: Requires completion of the Academy Crystal Cave dungeon and taking the elevator behind the Crystalians bosses. This leads to a tower inside the academy, on the top of which a chest containing the spell can be found.
name: Terra Magica

hint: Hermit Village in Mt. Gelmir: Acquired from Primeval Sorcerer Azur sitting near the cliffs in the northeast.
name: Comet Azur

hint: Inside a chest within Heretical Rise, in Mountaintops of the Giants. Players have to access the location via an invisible bridge starting from the other side of the ravine, and advance following a white mist that indicates the safe path (which is significantly easier to see at night). The safe path starts straight out then you have to go left and curve back towards the tower going upwards. The left path starts a little more than halfway from where you started.
name: Founding Rain of Stars

hint: Obtained when unlocking the Remembrance of The Full Moon Queen's power by handing it over to Enia at Roundtable Hold.
name: Rennala's Full Moon

hint: Chelona's Rise: Found in a chest at the top of the tower after unlocking the seal. See the Chelona's Rise page for details on how to unseal the tower.  Note: This spell and the location it is found in is accessible only after you have made significant progress in Ranni's questline which will grant you access to the upper plateau in southwest Liurnia.
name: Ranni's Dark Moon

hint: Dropped by Preceptor Miriam in the Carian Study Hall.
name: Magic Downpour

hint: Starting Equipment for the Prisoner Class.  Can be purchased from Miriel, Pastor of Vows at the Church of Vows for  3,000 Runes.
name: Magic Glintblade

hint: Sold by Preceptor Seluvis for 7500   at Seluvis's Rise  Can be obtained post-mortem via Seluvis's Bell Bearing. (from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold)
name: Glintstone Icecrag

hint: Can be bought from Preceptor Seluvis for 6,000 Runes. Seluvis is located in Seluvis's Rise, inside the Three Sisters region of Liurnia of the Lakes.       Before Seluvis will sell you Sorceries, you must progress in his quest line. The choices you make do not matter.    Alternatively, giving Ranni the Fingerslayer Blade causes Seluvis's death, or the player could simply attack him. He drops Seluvis's Bell Bearing, and the spell can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at Roundtable Hold after offering the bearing to them.
name: Freezing Mist

hint: After giving the Royal House Scroll to Miriel Pastor of Vows, Sorceress Sellen, or Preceptor Seluvis, the spell can be purchased for  1,500 Runes.
name: Carian Slicer

hint: Caria Manor: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in an area behind the gardens, to the east. Video Location
name: Carian Piercer

hint: Can be purchased from Sorceress Sellen for  2,500 Runes. Sellen is located in Limgrave: Waypoint Ruins.
name: Scholar's Shield

hint: Dropped by Preceptor Miriam in the secret area of the Carian Study Hall unlocked using the Carian Inverted Statue. Elden Ring Interactive  Video Location
name: Lucidity

hint: Looted off a corpse on the second floor, west side, of the Church of the Cuckoo in Raya Lucaria Academy. The only way to reach this is going through the broken glass window of the church via the rooftops.
name: Shattering Crystal

hint: Can be purchased from Gowry for 4,000 Runes after completing his quest line.
name: Night Shard

hint: In Church of Irith: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab after delivering the spare Academy Glintstone Key to Thops. Reload the area after delivering the key to spawn the scarab.
name: Thops's Barrier

hint: Sold by Preceptor Seluvis for 9000  at Seluvis' Rise  Can be obtained post-mortem via Seluvis's Bell Bearing. (from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold)
name: Carian Retaliation

hint: This Sorcery can be found at the top of the Tower after completing the Mirage Rise puzzle. When you reach at the location, although your map marks there is a tower, you will notice that there is nothing there! However, you will receive a map, called Mirage Riddle. You will have to interact with three Phantom crests.  The first one is next to that initial position, hard to miss.  The second one can be found by continuing to the west, near the rock wall. Enemies will spawn.  The final one, is near the Bower of Bounty site of grace. Starting at the Bower of Bounty site of grace, head directly south to the edge of a cliff. Here a small enemy will spawn. Once you see this enemy, head east along the cliffside. On the left side you will see a strange looking stone which you have to hit in order to reveal the phantom crest. The stone lies before the bridge and will likely have messages surrounding it.. Once you found all three, head to where the tower was supposed to be, to actually find it this time. Climb all the way to the top to find this sorcery, along with Unseen Form and x5 Slumbering Egg.  Elden Ring Interactive
name: Unseen Blade

hint: Found in a chest in an underground cellar just north of the Street of Sages Ruins. It is surrounded by Servants of Rot, but otherwise is free to be picked up.

hint: Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree: Found on a grave in the western section of the graveyard in the northeast of the city.From the Haligtree Roots Site of Grace, go back up the northeastern elevator into the church and head out through the door in front of you. From there, turn left and make your way down, fighting your way through the many Lesser Kindred of Rot in the area. The Bell Bearing will be at the end of the area, surrounded by graves on the cliffside.Alternatively you can enter the same church from the Drainage Canal Site of Grace. Exit to the east and turn left, walking on the tree branch. Drop down to the right onto the brace, then to the left onto another branch, and then drop down to the balcony below. From there drop down into the church and exit northeast to the graveyard where the Bell Bearing is.  Video location, Halligtree
name: Ghost-Glovewort Picker's Bell Bearing [3]

hint: Where to find Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [1]  Can be purchased from Merchant Kalé for 500 Runes. Kalé is located in: Limgrave, Church of Elleh.  Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them Kale's Bell Bearing.

hint: Where to find Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [6]  Located in Fort Haight, can be looted from the dead body in the room at the top of the main stone stairs.
name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [6]

hint: Where to find Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [10]  On a dead body in Stormveil Castle.       From Rampart Tower (Site of Grace), head out the north door. Jump to the roof immediately visible to the east. (This likely requires a running start).    Head east across the rooftop, and at the fallen column, jump over the wall and onto the roof to the east.    Turn left from the roof and follow the right ledge, then jump down to next walkway, and down again the level with the 2 enemies (optional combat) standing facing away from you..    Proceed north and cross the bridge. The recipe is on the corpse directly ahead, hunched over a platform and guarded by 2 weak enemies.    Video Location
name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [10]

hint: Where to find Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [7]It's found at the very edge of the collapsed bridge next of Stormveil Castle, crossing it from Stormhill. Held by a dead man sitting there. There's no big risk to fall as there is ground below and the fall is non-lethal.
name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [7]

hint: Where to find Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [21]  Can be found Inside the Volcano Manor, going upstairs when you enter the hallway from the lobby, enter the first door to the right, the same one with the corpse with a Perfume Bottle. Follow the path through a room full of Snails and you'll end up with a room with two ways forward - one down a flight of steps, another through an open doorway to your left. Head left first, being wary of Snails that may ambush you and continue until you reach a dead end. The corpse at the end of this passageway has the Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [21] on it, and to the left of it, reveal another hidden door that opens up into a room with the Depraved Perfumer Carmaan Ashes.  Video Location
name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [21]

hint: Where to find Missionary's Cookbook [6]  Volcano Manor Region; From Temple of Eiglay Site of Grace, take the lift up and go outside, follow the path and drop down into the area with the lava and slugs. Cross the rock bridge and continue up the path until you reach a large, open area of lava, and an Abductor Virgin enemy. There are TWO openings in this area. One is a broken window in a tower near the Abductor Virgin, the other is a doorway farther to the West. Jump through the FIRST opening, through the window of the tower into a dark room, climb down the ladder near the door (not the window you just entered through), walk down the stairway to the bottom floor, and the corpse with this cookbook can be found behind a cell door.  Video Location
name: Missionary's Cookbook [6]

hint: Can be found in a Kaiden Sellsword camp North-East of the Agheel Lake North Site of Grace in Limgrave.

Easiest way to reach these is ashes is while doing Ranni's questline (the portal you enter from Renna's Rise will take you near the ashes). After entering Ainsel River proceed south along the tunnel entering into the next main room with enemies, proceed southwest while hugging the edge until you reach the waterfall, it can be found on a corpse on the right side of the ledge.  Video Location
name: Clayman Ashes

hint: Where to Find Cleanrot Knight Finlay Ashes In Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree, start at the Prayer Room site of grace. Go through the northern door and and continue in that direction, fighting past several enemies, until you reach a small stairway leading up.After going up the stairway and defeating the enemies, look right (east), and peer down to see a sort of archway. Further north of the archway, you should see a gazebo. (The room with the chest will be near the gazebo.)Jump down onto the archway, then face north again and jump to reach the area where the gazebo is. Once in the center of the gazebo, face west, and you'll see a room with a Cleanrot Knight. -- this is the room with the chest in it. Video Location
name: Cleanrot Knight Finlay Ashes

hint: Where to Find Azula Beastman Ashes   Crumbling Farum Azula: Found at the bottom level of the Dragon Temple. Begin at the Dragon Temple grace site, then jump down to the west onto the stairs. Do not go up the stairs; turn east and jump down again. There is an entrance door to the east with stairs going up which leads to a crypt with several sarcophagi and two enemies. One static, one patrolling. The ashes can be found on the furthest sarcophagus in the back. Video Location
name: Azula Beastman Ashes

hint: Can be found in Deeproot Depths, from the Great Waterfall Crest site of grace, head up a small incline to the South. The scarab is in front of two ants near some shrubbery. Fittingly, it is behind the Erdtree Avatar who drops the Staff of the Avatar.  Video Location
name: Ash of War: Golden Land

hint: Redmane Castle, dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in a small graveyard along the south cliffside behind the castle. From the front gate, hug right along the cliff towards the ballista, going up and past the vampire bats. There will be a small gap in the cliff that must be jumped across to get to the graveyard.   From the Chamber Outside the Plaza site of grace, head south. Make your way through the barricades and head down the stairs to the SW (there is a transporter on them). Go past the tree with hanged men and make a south up a few short stairways into the castle. Go up the stairway inside and head outside again to the south. Either a) Make a left and turn right/south to enter the castle again, taking out any resting soldiers if need be. On the left side at the other end of the room is a door which opens up into the graveyard area (only openable from this side).OR b) instead of making a left, continue eastward, go up the ladder, make a right and go up some stairs, turn west, then south after the castle turret, and move onto a wooden ramp curving counterclockwise around the turret. Go down the ladder here to enter the graveyard. The door in the above method can be seen to the west, up several flights of wooden stairs.  Video Location
name: Ash of War: Flaming Strike

hint: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in Leyndell, Royal Capital. From the Avenue Balcony site of Grace, head down the stairs and pass through the gate, follow the railings on the left side up to the sleeping Commoner, from which the Teardrop Scarab should be visible down below.  This can not be obtained in Leyndell, Ashen Capital.  Video Location
name: Ash of War: Thunderbolt

hint: Caria Manor: High above a large stone structure. This is accessible by climbing down the cliffside graveyard from the manor's upper level. From Manor Upper Level Site of Grace, head north out the door and down the stairs, follow the path and up the stairs past the mages and the giant, go up the stairs on either side, but instead of proceeding through the doorway in front of you, go through the far door on the left. From here, carefully drop down the wooden platforms and you should reach a graveyard area with some jar warriors, drop down a few more ledges, and you should see this Ash on a corpse lying on top of an archway. Video Location
name: Ash of War: Carian Grandeur

hint: Crumbling Farum Azula: Dropped by the Godskin Duo Boss inside the Dragon Temple area. Elden Ring.  Video Location
name: Ash of War: Black Flame Tornado

hint: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in Altus Plateau, northeast of Erdtree-Gazing Hill, flying above a pond with trees. Elden Ring.

From the site of grace, exit east into the graveyard and head northeast to find a wooden bridge. Just past the bridge, head slightly southeast towards the cliff edge behind a cluster of gravestones. There should be a lower path you can jump down onto and the scarab should be in view at this point.  Video Location
name: Ash of War: Spectral Lance

hint: Dropped by a teardrop scarab at the southwest section of the Aeonia Swamp in Caelid..       This teardrop scarab can teleport a  short distance if the player gets too close. If available, apply appropriate measures to kill it from range.

Turning around from where Iji's workstation is, they are just beyond the gate that was formerly an Illusory Wall.

hint: Starting Equipment for the Prisoner Class  Has a chance to be dropped by Noble Sorcerers at Caria Manor.  Drops from a lone Noble Sorcerer, south of the Waypoint Ruins (and west of a small collection of graves). Behind the large broken tower ruin where the Troll-pulled Carriage's caravan starts it's journey. (map co-ordinates are:  -194.50781 : 113.69531 )  Early game, you can farm for this on the noble sorcerers Northeast of the Agheel Lake South grace in southern Limgrave. From where you enter Limgrave, head Southeast and look for some stones you can use as steps to drop down without dying, they'll be close to the border of the lake. Cut around the bottom of the lake, avoiding the patrolling mercenary, and then cut Southeast across the field toward the road. You should see a the Agheel Lake South grace point on a little shelf below the road. From the grace, there are at least 4 noble sorcerers nearby, but 2 are easy to reach. Wait for the mercenary patrolling the road to ride by, then head across the road and left until you're climbing the slope. One sorcerer & retinue will be coming down this slope from the camp above. After killing them, turn around, and there is another sorcerer & retinue traveling down the road. You may want to wait for the mercenary to pass again, because he takes actual effort to fight (whereas the sorcerers have bad eyesight and go down quickly). Once you've killed and looted both groups, head back to the grace to rest, because it's a rare enough drop that it'll probably take you many resets to get.
name: Glintstone Staff

hint: Gatefront Ruins, dropped by Godrick Soldiers patrolling the outpost
name: Godrick Soldier Gauntlets

hint: Gatefront Ruins, dropped by Godrick Soldiers patrolling the outpost.

Once you spawn in, turn around to face south east. There will be four Brass Shield carrying Godrick Soldiers in the Gatefront Ruins area that should be relatively easy to farm. Two are in a small fenced in area to the right of the road. One is on the road, carrying a horn. The last one is sitting next to a fire nearby.   Nearly all the Raya Lucaria Soldiers who are gathered outside Raya Lucaria Academy are carrying one, making it a good place to farm for it if you missed getting it earlier.

hint: Killing the chariot in Fringefolk Hero's Grave (requires two Stonesword Keys to access.).  Follow the path to where you get the Erdtree's Favor talisman, but walk off the edge before you reach the bridge, there is a platform there, then jump off again. You'll find some stairs that lead to an elevator, take the elevator up. Be careful of the dragon knight shade on the far left. once he's dealt with, go to where he was, and look to the right, there are 3 large pots suspended by 3 ropes on the ceiling. In order to get the bow, you have to kill the chariot by dropping one of the pots on it as it rolls by. I used the longbow, and timed it by 1 Mississippi after it makes contact with the wall closest to you.
name: Erdtree Greatbow

hint: Dropped by Godrick Foot Soldiers found throughout Limgrave.
name: Foot Soldier Cap

hint: Can be found at Fringefolk Hero's Grave, right under the beginning of the game. To get there, use two Stonesword Keys on the double Imp Keystone next to the Stranded Graveyard Site of Grace, and progress down the tunnel with the mechanized chariot until the path splits and you can go either up or down. Go up until you reach the end of the tunnel, and inside the small room is a Banished Knight that once killed will give you the item.

The body with the helmet will be straight ahead at the end of the hallway.

hint: It can be found in a chest in the back of the eastern Carriage, defended by a group of soldiers, near the Gatefront Ruins.  Dropped by Brother Corhyn, along with his Corhyn's Bell Bearing, and Corhyn's Robe, after finding him in Leyndell, Ashen Capital at the end of Goldmask's questline. Exhaust his dialogue, reload the area, and the items are found where he once was.       If you offered Corhyn the Tonic of Forgetfulness at the bridge near the Stargazer's Ruins, he will still be there after reaching Ashen Leyndell. Reload the area and collect the items from where he once was.    If you've entered Crumbling Farum Azula without solving the Law of Regression puzzle of Goldmask's questline, these items are found wherever you've last found Corhyn, be it in the Roundtable Hold or in Altus Plateau.    These items are also obtained by killing Corhyn.

hint: The Golem Greatbow has a chance to drop from any Golem archer. The Golem Greatbow does not drop from Golems with halberds.  One can be found on the Limgrave Tower Bridge in Stormhill, which can be accessed from Stormveil Castle. Two halberd Golems are also found on the bridge.  Two can be found on the path towards the colosseum in Caelid. This location is only accessible via a lift in the Siofra River that takes the player to the Deep Siofra Well.       These two Golem archers fire magic-imbued explosive arrows and are also the only source of Golem's Magic Arrow.      One can be found next to the top of the Grand Lift of Dectus, in the Altus Plateau. It is accompanied by a single halberd Golem.       If the Grand Lift of Dectus is activated after finding both halves of the Dectus Medallion, the Golems guarding the lift will be non-hostile until the the player initiates combat. (needs confirmation, not sure if the game checks for possession of the medallion or usage of the lift)       One can be found outside the entrance of Castle Morne, at the southern tip of the Weeping Peninsula.  Two can be found in the north-eastern section of the Capital Outskirts, on the hill approaching the northern entrance to Leyndell Royal Capital (Legacy Dungeon).  One can be found in the Mountaintops of the Giants, guarding the tall and narrow path north.
name: Golem Greatbow

hint: Stormveil Castle: Starting from the Rampart Tower grace, exit onto the ramparts where the war hawks and explosive barrels are. At the tower on the west side where the second war hawk holding an explosive barrel is, jump up onto the battlements on the north side. There is a corpse visible with an item (Marred Wooden Shield). Jumping down to the walls beneath will allow the player to get to the shield. Jumping down further will land the player on a ledge that will collapse, causing them to fall far below into some bushes. A Silver Teardrop Scarab holds the Ash of War..

hint: Dropped by the wandering Banished Knight at Cathedral of Dragon Communion (Altered, Red hood), and the one standing by the cliff, to the west.

hint: Located at Stormveil Castle.  When you reach the main castle grounds where you fight the Lion Guardian, head inside the room with the armored statues, and through the arch doorway, to reach the Limgrave Tower Bridge Site of Grace. Specifically, you'll find the on a body that you can loot, just at the top of the first set of stairs, resting against a pillar on the left side.   Boltdrake Talisman +1: This more-powerful variant of the Boltdrake Talisman can be found in a storage shed inside the Old Altus Tunnel dungeon.   Boltdrake Talisman +2: Found on a corpse hanging off an opening in a tall tower south of the Dragon Temple Rooftop Site of Grace. Reaching this area is a bit complex:       You will first need to head southeast to the large plaza guarded by a stationary Farum Azula Dragon, which is constantly raining red lightning all around the area.    From here, look northeast, then drop down a series of cliffs to the east to reach the opening at the bottom of a large building.    Follow the linear path here to a balcony with a ladder leading up to a terrace. Mind the Banished Knights patrolling the area.    Directly in front of the ladder is a lift building; to your left is a chest with the Dragon Towershield. Take the lift up to a series of slopes leading to a hallway underneath the same bridge you crossed to get to the southeast plaza.    The passage ahead has a Crucible Knight fighting a couple of Beastmen. Fight your way through the hallway (or just run past the enemies) to reach a ladder at the end.    Climb up the ladder to reach an open window where the corpse holding the talisman can be found.      Boltdrake Talisman +2 Video Location, Crumbling Farum Azula
name: Boltdrake Talisman

hint: The Godslayer's Seal weapon can be found at Stormveil Castle  Location: Stormveil Castle  Nearest Site of Grace: Rampart Tower    From the Rampart Tower grace, take the elevator down to the feasting hall where the Grafted Scion was roaming. Exit into the courtyard with all of the waiting archers. Make a hard left into a small stairway that goes underground. You'll find a room that is guarded by four Rats, and ahead is a doorway that is blocked by a white fog. To dispel the fog, you will need to use a Stonesword Key on the Imp Statue. You'll find a stockroom on the other side; the room has a treasure chest containing the seal.  Video Location
name: Godslayer's Seal

hint: Dropped by Crucible Knight found in Stormveil Castle directly below the Ramparts. Once you reach the walkway where the three Warhawks are located, head to the first left turn you see. It should be a dead end. Once you reach this dead end jump down, and keep heading down until you find a collapsible cliff. The Crucible Knight should be waiting for you by a ruined archway. Video Location  For players having difficulty defeating the Crucible Knight, there is a way to cheese him by using the elevator in the building behind the archway he comes from. Wait for the knight to pass by and sneak behind him towards the elevator. Step on the pressure plate and then quickly hop off. Go back to the knight and lure him towards the elevator. Walk around the shaft opening until he falls in.
name: Aspects of the Crucible: Horns

hint: Can be located at Stormveil Castle.  Nearest Site of Grace: Liftside Chamber.  Looted off a corpse that can be found at the pit of the castle's crypt. The body can be found next to a giant face that is structured from roots. It is guarded by an Ulcerated Tree Spirit.
name: Prince of Death's Pustule

hint: Players can obtain the Torchpole by killing the Stormveil Castle courtyard guards.        One enemy dropping this weapon can be found close to Stormveil Cliffside Site of Grace, just up the wooden stairs along the wall. Although tempting, it is not recommended that you use projectile weapons/ranged attacks from the Site of Grace to kill this enemy from afar, as upon death the soldier may fall off the edge.
name: Torchpole

hint: Chance to drop from two specific spectral Banished Knights located in Castle Sol that can be seen wearing the unaltered cloaked armor.    The northern one can be easily farmed by starting from the Castle Sol Rooftop site of grace and running south to the elevator. The Banished Knight can be shot with ranged weapons from here causing it to teleport to the player. The same can be achieved by shooting an arrow through the arrow slit in the grace platform (west side), although the knight doesn't always teleport when shooting him from this spot.  The southern one can be reached from the Church of the Eclipse site of grace by exiting through the church to the left, turning right outside, and heading up the ladder to the catwalks. After following the catwalk past the exile soldier and around the small tower, the Banished Knight can be found just past the ladder leading down. It is recommended that the player jump onto the lower roof next to the catwalk and tower, and bait the red-eyed Banished Knight into teleporting onto the small wooden catwalk extension of the roof; then the player can roll or jump to the walkway the Banished Knight was just standing on. The Banished Knight will slowly walk towards the player, then fall to its death onto the ground below, saving the player a good deal of trouble. Then the player walk down the walkway and make their way over to the loot, which will be in a corner, behind a tombstone.   Dropped from all other Banished Knights. They can be found in Stormveil Castle, Cathedral of Dragon Communion, Crumbling Farum Azula, and Castle Sol.
name: Banished Knight Armor

The room can be cleared quickly (~15-20 seconds if you can one-shot them) as they are all near each other. Teleport back to the Secluded Cell grace and repeat.   Video Location

Can drop from the Omens near the "Abandoned Coffin" Site of Grace on the Altus Plateau.       An easy way to farm here is to pop a Silver-Pickled Fowl Foot and approach the first axe Omen by advancing Northeast between the coffin carriages. Clear that first mob who tries to jump on you, run back rest, and do it again as many times as you can before the Item Discovery effect wears off.      Two Omens wielding this axe can be found near the Underground Roadside Site of Grace in Subterranean Shunning-Grounds.

hint: Travel to the Seaside Ruins Site of Grace. Walk south a short distance along the edge of the cliff (just past the crumbling archway). Look down toward the beach below and look for the windstream. Hop on Torrent and simply walk off the edge. Travel north until you see a small cave opening in the cliff face.  Travel to the The First Step Site of Grace. and make your way down the cliff to the east (should lead to an area with bats and crucifixes). Continue south east towards a bunch of crumbling pillars. Line yourself up with the pillar that is standing on the beach. Then, run or walk off of the edge of the cliff and land on a small ledge on said pillar (do not jump as you will be blocked by the ledge at the same level as the cliff). Then, safely hop down to the beach and the entrance to the cave is on the bottom of the cliff. Haligdrake Talisman +1:  Leyndell Catacombs: Found on a corpse next to a Lesser Spirit-caller Snail. From the Leyndell Catacombs site of grace, head up the elevator in the southeast to find a room with 3 spirit crossbowmen. Look under the arch next to the stairs for an illusory wall. Hit it to dispel the illusion, and then hit the wall on the left to dispel another illusion. The corpse and snail are found in here.Haligdrake Talisman +2: Looted off a body in Mohgwyn Palace, found in a small cluster of graves near a watchful Giant Crow perched up high.
name: Haligdrake Talisman

hint: Chance to drop from any Cuckoo Knight wielding the greatshield       Farming route (click for image): If you farm this route in reverse coming from Bellum Church, you can snipe the sitting Cuckoo Knight first and ignore the other mobs. By the time you kill the last Cuckoo Knight you should have enough distance between you and the other mobs to go out of combat. If you start from the East Raya Lucaria Gate Site of Grace and kill the sitting Cuckoo Knight last, you'll have to either run back to the site of grace, kill all the surrounding mobs or use your Memory of Grace, since being in combat will prevent you from fast traveling.    Alternative route (click for image): Start in the Bellum Church and head east. While behind the ruin (Point 1), summon your spirit ash. Go around to the front, and immediately kill the caster standing on the ruin (just to make the fight less annoying). Kill the Cuckoo Knight  and two other mobs (Point 2); while fighting, a farther mob will sound a horn. This will summon a horseback Knight. While fighting the horseback Knight, another will come around during their standard patrol. After these three have been killed, head south-west and then east to go up the hill to Point 3. A solo Knight will be here. After killing, refill on HP/FP and jump down the ruins and follow the path to Point 4. Summon your ashes again to fight the group on the road, including a Knight. While fighting this group, you may attract the attention of the Knight on the north-west side of the road. If not, head up to kill them, then cross the road to kill the final one. This path will net you 7 Cuckoo Knight kills in around 2 minutes.
name: Cuckoo Greatshield

hint: The Full Moon Crossbow weapon can be found in a bell tower, along the Raya Lucaria Academy rooftops.  First, head to the area with the rooftops:       From the Debate Parlor Site of Grace, head out into the courtyard to the north. Go up the destroyed staircase to the northwest and then up another set of stairs northward to where the two sorcerers are. Jump over the railing to the west. Go up the stairs and around the corner. Jump over the railing to the south to land on some rooftops.      After reaching the rooftops, climb up the ladder on a building to the southwest to reach a bridge with a Glintstone Sorcerer and three Avionette Soldiers. Behind them is a bell tower where the chest containing the Full Moon Crossbow is located.  The entrance to the bell tower is on a lower level which requires taking a path around on the rooftops. First, go past the bell tower and drop down two levels. From there, perform a running jump across a gap to reach another section of rooftops to the west.  After making the jump, follow the roofs south past the Marionette Soldiers to enter the bell tower. Climb up the ladder inside to find a chest with the Full Moon Crossbow.    On the first roof you drop down to after crossing the bridge (with the sorcerer and three Avionette Soldiers), there will be a spike that you can jump on:  After jumping on top of that spike, jump onto the gargoyle protruding from the wall to the west.  From there, jump to the roof where there is a body holding an item (a Smithing Stone [4]).  Facing west, you can perform a running jump to cross the gap and land on the rooftops below.  Video Location
name: Full Moon Crossbow

hint: Found at Raya Lucaria Academy.  Closest Site of Grace: Debate Parlor.  From the Site of Grace, go North. Upon reaching the courtyard, turn left and climb the ruined staircase, then climb the second staircase where 2 mages are shooting at you. When you reach the door, turn left and jump over the railing - behind you is a mage and a shortcut 1-way door. Climb the stairs and turn left, then jump over the railing again. Follow the roof and climb the ladder. After the mage ahead of you, turn right and follow the path until you see a lower roof top. Jump on it, then jump again on the second one. Turn left and go to the edge, there's a gap. Jump it and follow the roof forward and to the right. You will enter a tower with a wooden floor and a hole in it. There are wooden platforms to drop down. The Crystallized Crab is on one of these platforms. Look for the Crystallized Crab inside the hole and kill it, and it will reward you with the crown.

Walk on the narrow path and you'll notice a group of Glintstone Zombies worshipping a statue, simply kill the enemies and pick up the glowing item next to the statue to receive the set.

hint: Chance to drop from Lesser Mad Pumpkin Heads wielding this weapon.       The Pumpkin Head in the encampment north of the Foot of the Four Belfries Site of Grace carries it.           From the Foot of the Four Belfries grace, line the center of your compass to the first notch right of North. Go straight until you reach a rockface that ascends upwards. Follow the rockface until you see a spiked wooden barricade to your left. The Pumpkin Head enemy will be just on the other side. Using this path you can fight him without alerting any of the other enemies and also land a preemptive attack from behind for a quicker farm.          One can be found Southwest from the Road of Iniquity Side Path site of grace. Continuing southwest, you will find a second one sitting on a ledge overlooking The Shaded Castle.      A Pumpkin Head wielding one can also be found just outside of Fort Haight and can drop it, but he will no longer spawn if the fort is cleared.

With just 18 int, rock sling, and ideally the meteorite staff, you can stand on the balcony near the site of grace and attack the crows. The first hit will knock them to the ground, and then you can just fling rocks at them until they die and they will be completely unable to attack you since they can't reach you. hint: Can get this early with precise jumps on the cliffs near Third Church of Marika by the beach.  Falling from the top of the cliff also works.  Going through the Gaol Cave is the intended route.   Credit to anonymous comment below for the following: I'll try and better explain what the writers meant by “precise jumps on the cliffs”. Go to the Third Church of Marika and face Southeast. Ride your horse until the cliff meets the water. The cliff side here should have a more red hue to it than the rest of the stone typically found in Limgrave. If you’re facing the wall due East you’ll notice a cragged vertical line where one part of the cliff face is protruding from another. Double jump on Torrent while following that and you should now be riding up the cliff face. Now turn your camera to face Northeast, you’ll notice what appears to be an arrowhead of grey stone forming a flat surface among the red-hued cliff. Jump there. Turn the camera South. While it doesn’t look feasible, sprint jump with torrent towards the protrusion across the before mentioned cragged vertical line. When you land, quickly double jump (facing East) to get on top of the ledge. You’ll notice above you several steps in the cliff face just slightly to the right- climb those. Then, jump due North onto the final platform. You will now be above the cliff and able to drop down.
name: Regalia of Eochaid

hint: Where to Find Crystalian Ashes  Sellia Hideaway: Once you reach the first large room, walk across to the other end of the room, staying on the top level. You'll soon enter a tunnel with a Stake of Marika in it. As soon as you reach the end of this tunnel, hug the right wall closely, and you'll pass 3 giant purple crystals on your left almost immediately. Walk up the third crystal, drop to another crystal facing south, then drop to a third crystal facing south-southwest. This crystal leads to a tunnel in the far wall. In that tunnel is a drop that leads directly into the room with the chest containing these ashes, protected by 3 sorcerers.  The entrance to Sellia Hideaway is located north of the Church of the Plague site of grace. Look for a small graveyard with a sorcerer wielding a staff and club. Behind the headstone where that sorcerer spawns there is an illusionary wall that hides the entrance to the dungeon.
name: Crystalian Ashes

hint: Drops from the spear wielding Lesser Cleanrot Knights just south of the Heart of Aeonia by Commander O'Neil (very low drop rate). Closest is directly outside the "Prayer Room" Site of Grace (very low drop rate).
name: Cleanrot Spear

hint: Drops from Scythe-wielding Lesser Cleanrot Knights just south of the Heart of Aeonia near Commander O'Neil (rare drop)  there are two different types of Cleanrot Knights near the Heart of Aeonia. The ones already patrolling the area are wielding Halo Scythes and the ones that rise up from the waters are wielding Cleanrot Spears, each weapon only drops from its respective knight type, so only farm the ones you need.  Drops from the Scythe-wielding Lesser Cleanrot Knight in Elphael Brace of the Haligtree.
name: Halo Scythe

hint: Dropped by Commander O'Neil upon his defeat. He can be found in eastern Caelid, in a clearing within Aeonia Swamp.

hint: Drops from most Lesser Cleanrot Knights.  The single Cleanrot Knight outside the Prayer Room Site of Grace in Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree is a convenient location for farming.  For a farming spot much earlier in the game, starting at the Inner Aeonia Site of Grace, head South through the roots and there will be a Cleanrot Knight amidst several Aoenian Butterflies
name: Cleanrot Knight's Sword

hint: Where to Find Radahn Soldier Ashes   Found in the War-Dead Catacombs at the northern tip of Radahn's arena. Go up the stairs to the back right of the first room and go left. Past the archer at the end of the hall turn right, turning right again at the end of that hall past the greatsword knight. Jump through the window to the right near the end of this hall. Go left up the stairs and the ashes will be in a room in front of you behind a knight.
name: Radahn Soldier Ashes

hint: Where to Find Redmane Knight Ogha   Dropped by the Putrid Tree Spirit in the War-Dead Catacombs located in eastern Caelid. To find the entrance of the catacombs, travel to the site of grace that appears after defeating Starscourge Radahn and proceed to head north by north east until you have reached the upper most corner of the area, where the watershore meets the cliffside. You'll be able to see the small door along the cliffside.
name: Redmane Knight Ogha Ashes

hint: Base talisman: Tombsward Cave, a small dungeon in the Weeping Peninsula: Located southeast of the Fourth Church of Marika. The medallion is obtained after defeating the boss, Miranda the Blighted Bloom.+1 Variant: Altus Plateau, south of the Outer Wall Battleground Site of Grace: You will hear Margit whisper, "I see you, Tarnished..."  to you before appearing on the road. Defeat him again and it will drop.  +2 Variant: Miquella's Haligtree: The closest site of grace is the Haligtree Town Plaza. Go south towards the roof with a dead body on it. For reference, the dead body is two stories above the talisman. Continue southeast, and jump down once. Jump across the gap, and then do an immediate 180 turn and make a running jump into the building below. It'll be in a chest guarded by Scarlet Rot Zombies. Video location

hint: From the Altus Highway Junction Grace. Go due South until you can clearly see the road. As you face South, there should be a square pattern in the road. Ahead or to your left there will be a very small dust cloud in the road. This is the scarab. It does not make noise or leave glowing prints on the ground like others.  Earthshaker can be obtained killing a stationary invisible scarab just South of Altus Highway Junction (found near a statue at the first intersection, you can hear it and see a little cloud of dust moving, note: not a scarab that leaves a light trail).  The Scarab is present at any time, but easier to see at night. Using a skill/spell like Glintblade Phalanx may help, as it can target and kill the scarab automatically, if you get close enough.  See it on the Elden Ring Map.
name: Ash of War: Earthshaker

hint: Altus Plateau: Inside Leyndell Catacombs, Subterranean Shunning-Grounds, under Leyndell. From the Underground Roadside site of grace, turn left and climb down the ladder on the right into a room full of imps and pipes. On the pipe at the right end from where you enter, you can drop down onto another pipe then down below onto the ground with two Giant Crayfish and the Mohg's Shackle. One door leads into the Leyndell Catacomb site of grace. From the Leyndell Catacombs site of grace, head into the catacomb until you find a room with the flame-blowing stone imp column. Make your way into the room with the column, and hit it to make it rise up or lower down, then ride it up into a room with an Omen. The talisman is at the altar table behind it.  Video Location
name: Crucible Scale Talisman

hint: Travel to the Seaside Ruins Site of Grace. Walk south a short distance along the edge of the cliff (just past the crumbling archway). Look down toward the beach below and look for the windstream. Hop on Torrent and simply walk off the edge. Travel north until you see a small cave opening in the cliff face.  Travel to the The First Step Site of Grace. and make your way down the cliff to the east (should lead to an area with bats and crucifixes). Continue south east towards a bunch of crumbling pillars. Line yourself up with the pillar that is standing on the beach. Then, run or walk off of the edge of the cliff and land on a small ledge on said pillar (do not jump as you will be blocked by the ledge at the same level as the cliff). Then, safely hop down to the beach and the entrance to the cave is on the bottom of the cliff. Haligdrake Talisman +1:  Leyndell Catacombs: Found on a corpse next to a Lesser Spirit-caller Snail. From the Leyndell Catacombs site of grace, head up the elevator in the southeast to find a room with 3 spirit crossbowmen. Look under the arch next to the stairs for an illusory wall. Hit it to dispel the illusion, and then hit the wall on the left to dispel another illusion. The corpse and snail are found in here.Haligdrake Talisman +2: Looted off a body in Mohgwyn Palace, found in a small cluster of graves near a watchful Giant Crow perched up high.
name: Haligdrake Talisman +1

hint: Can be found in Leyndell, Royal Capital, after beating Godfrey, First Elden Lord (Golden Shade): From the Erdtree Sanctuary grace, walk out the western door, take the elevator down, go down the staircase to the walkway, jump down onto the giant spear lodged into the building, and then walk up it  (you should see the Bolt shining near the handle of the giant spear).       Additionally, the spear can be obtained upon first entry of Leyndell, Royal Capital, without having killed the Godfrey shade: From the East Capital Rampart Gate grace, go out the western door, follow the path south to the lift, ride it down, climb up the ladder inside the room ahead, go southwest onto the patio with two Perfumers, jump over the southwest railing onto the walkway below, go west along the pathway until you reach the railing around the giant spear on your left, make a running jump from the broken railing to the roof of the gazebo, make a running jump southwest onto the far right side of the ledge below the spear (this is hard, you need to jump from the right side of the roof and about halfway down—instead of the edge—to have enough height; you can head northwest to the stairs to try again if you miss), jump up the giant spear (carefully, there are several opportunities to fall), collect weapon.       Cannot be acquired in Leyndell, Ashen Capital. You must get it before defeating Maliketh, the Black Blade at Crumbling Farum Azula.
name: Bolt of Gransax

Elden Ring    Can be farmed at the Haligtree Canopy Site of Grace. There are three east of the Grace.           The first one after the Grace has a high chance to fall off of the branch and into the void. However, a second one can be found on a much wider branch on the next level directly below it. This branch can be reached by jumping to the corpse on a stack of mushrooms. This is the most efficient way that you can kill one repeatedly and should it not drop anything you can use the map to return to the Grace.             Video Location

Once inside, exit the only door and immediately turn left to jump down to a nearby roof. Once on the roof, a broken window can be used to get back inside. After entering the broken window, turn right and the chest is nearby.  Video Location
name: Erdtree Bow

hint: 2x looted from Nepheli Loux at the Village of the Albinaurics in Western Liurnia of the Lakes.       You must first talk to Nepheli Loux in her first location, and exhaust her father's dialog options and then hers in the round table to get her to move to the pathway under the bridge. This is to get her to move to the location. You can slay her in her first location and get the axes as well. It is also possible to bait the enemies to attack her in her first location, in which she doesn't retaliate against the enemies.      Looted from a dead body in the courtyard with Iron Maidens near Fortified Manor, First Floor at Leyndell, Royal Capital.   Castle Sol: 1x found on a corpse on a wooden awning in the central building of the courtyard. To reach this, head north while hugging the western ramparts from the castle's Main Entrance. Look for a room inside the ramparts near the northern section. This room has several slimes and a ladder. Climb the ladder to get on top of the ramparts and follow it west to a wooden bridge that connects to the central building. Beware the spectral Exile enemies mounted on ballistae on the ramparts, as well as the central building. Once on the central building's roof, jump on top of the cluttered objects draped in cloth in the northeastern section so you can get over the wall onto the awning and collect the axe.  Video Location
name: Stormhawk Axe

hint: Found on the bed in the building with the Lower Capital Church site of grace in Leyndell, Royal Capital.
name: Deathbed Dress

hint: Leyndell, Royal Capital, West Capital Ramparts site of grace: Go south out of the room with the site of grace and down the flight of stairs to the floor underneath, make a complete U-turn in the room with the stairs to find a corpse with the sword.  The item can still be acquired in Leyndell, Ashen Capital. From the Leyndell, Capital of Ash site of grace, head west towards the dragon corpse's wing. Behind the wing, climb inside the broken wall, climb the ladder and keep going until you meet the same flight of stairs. Make a U-turn in the room down the stairs and the sword can be looted from the corpse at the end of the room.
name: Cane Sword

hint: Found on a corpse on a rooftop, in the area to the north east of the Avenue Balcony site of grace, in the Leyndell, Royal Capital.

hint: Found in Leyndell, Royal Capital, in the Fortified Manor. Beside the Sanctified Whetblade.

hint: From the West Capital Rampart site of grace in Leyndell, walk north to the next room with the single guard inside. hint: Given by Kenneth Haight as a reward for clearing out Fort Haight.   Found NW of the Avenue Balcony site of Leyndell, Royal Capital. Drop down a pit with a Broken Statue and it will be on a corpse.  Video Location

Can't be farmed after beating Maliketh, The Black Blade as the Duelists vanish afterwards.  May drop from the Duelist in Sainted Hero's Grave, but enemy does not respawn once defeated.

hint: The left side of the colosseum near the West Capital Rampart Site of Grace, in the last opening on a body, in Leyndell, Royal Capital. (Can also be obtained, in the same place, in Leyndell, Ashen Capital.)
name: Star Fist

hint: This Sorcery can be found in Altus Plateau at the top of the Tower after completing the Mirage Rise puzzle. When you reach at the location, although your map marks there is a tower, you will notice that there is nothing there! However, you will receive a map, called Mirage Riddle. You will have to interact with three Phantom crests.  The first one is next to that initial position, hard to miss.  The second one can be found by continuing to the west, near the rock wall. Enemies will spawn.  The final one, is near the Bower of Bounty site of grace. Starting at the Bower of Bounty site of grace, head directly south to the edge of a cliff. Here a small enemy will spawn. Once you see this enemy, head east along the cliffside. On the left side you will see a strange looking stone which you have to hit in order to reveal the phantom crest. The stone lies before the bridge and will likely have messages surrounding it. Once you found all three, head to where the tower was supposed to be, to actually find it this time. Climb all the way to the top to find this sorcery, along with Unseen Blade and x5 Slumbering Egg.Elden Ring Interactive
name: Unseen Form

hint: On the dead body of a corpse next to the Minor Erdtree Church Site of Grace in Leyndell Royal Capital.

hint: Dropped by Wormface in Altus Plateau. Elden Ring Interactive
name: Crimsonspill Crystal Tear

hint: Defeat Wormface at Minor Erdtree (Altus Plateau).

hint: Located at Stormveil Castle.  When you reach the main castle grounds where you fight the Lion Guardian, head inside the room with the armored statues, and through the arch doorway, to reach the Limgrave Tower Bridge Site of Grace. Specifically, you'll find the on a body that you can loot, just at the top of the first set of stairs, resting against a pillar on the left side.   Boltdrake Talisman +1: This more-powerful variant of the Boltdrake Talisman can be found in a storage shed inside the Old Altus Tunnel dungeon.   Boltdrake Talisman +2: Found on a corpse hanging off an opening in a tall tower south of the Dragon Temple Rooftop Site of Grace. Reaching this area is a bit complex:       You will first need to head southeast to the large plaza guarded by a stationary Farum Azula Dragon, which is constantly raining red lightning all around the area.    From here, look northeast, then drop down a series of cliffs to the east to reach the opening at the bottom of a large building.    Follow the linear path here to a balcony with a ladder leading up to a terrace. Mind the Banished Knights patrolling the area.    Directly in front of the ladder is a lift building; to your left is a chest with the Dragon Towershield. Take the lift up to a series of slopes leading to a hallway underneath the same bridge you crossed to get to the southeast plaza.    The passage ahead has a Crucible Knight fighting a couple of Beastmen. Fight your way through the hallway (or just run past the enemies) to reach a ladder at the end.    Climb up the ladder to reach an open window where the corpse holding the talisman can be found.      Boltdrake Talisman +2 Video Location, Crumbling Farum Azula
name: Boltdrake Talisman +1

hint: Found in a storage shed inside the Old Altus Tunnel dungeon.

hint: The Perfumer's Shield Shield can be found at the following location  Can be farmed from Perfumer enemies wielding the shield       Two Perfumer enemies carrying the shield can be found near the Perfumer's Grotto Site of Grace. Go down further into the cave. The Perfumer that stands on the top ledge carries a sword, but one of the two Perfumers that is patrolling the lower area carries the shield. The Perfumer that's sitting by the Giant Miranda Sprout also carries the shield.    Three Depraved Perfumer enemies carrying the shield can be found near the Shaded Castle Inner Gate Site of Grace. Go east, back through the poison ground area, and take the ladder to get on top of the inner castle wall. From the top of the ladder two Depraved Perfumers will be sitting on the ground to the left and one will be patrolling on the right.
name: Perfumer's Shield

Once you've dealt with them and opened the fog door, there are a final pair of Putrids watching over the talisman.    +2 Variant: Crumbling Farum Azula: Looted from a corpse on floating chunk of debris in the northern section, between Dragon Temple Lift and Dragon Temple Rooftop. Gelmir region. The talisman is found inside a chest at the end of the area sealed by an Imp Statue; a Stonesword Key is required.   +2 Variation: Can be found in Miquella's Haligtree. Travel to the Haligtree Town Site of Grace and exit through the northwestern door. Then climb the ladder and turn around to jump southeast across the gap.
