hint: Found in a cavern in Seethewater Cave filled with mushroom people and a Giant Poison Flower. Elden Ring Interactive
name: Mushroom Legs

hint: Found in a cavern in Seethewater Cave filled with mushroom people and a Giant Poison Flower.
name: Mushroom Body

hint: Dropped by the Kindred of Rot in Seethewater Cave.
name: Kindred of Rot's Exultation

hint: Perfumer Tricia and the Misbegotten Warrior can be found at the end of the Unsightly Catacombs, after unlocking the final door at the lowest level. These Catacombs are found beneath the Perfumer's Ruins near the western edge of Mt. Gelmir. The entrance is in the southwest cliff face below the ruins and requires a Stonesword Key to unlock.
name: Perfumer Tricia

hint: Prattling Pate "Apologies" can be found at Unsightly Catacombs in southwestern part of Altus Plateau. Found on a corpse in the back corridor on the level with the lever that controls the final door.  Prattling Pate "Hello"  Prattling Pate "Thank you"  Prattling Pate "Wonderful"  Prattling Pate "Please help"  Prattling Pate "Let's get to it"  Prattling Pate "You're beautiful"  Prattling Pate "My Beloved"
name: Prattling Pate Apologies

hint: The Coil Shield is located on a body in Volcano Cave, northeast of the Ninth Mt. Gelmir Campsite Site of Grace in Mt. Gelmir. From the cave grace, head into the large open room. From there, take the right-most tunnel (northwest) and follow it to the end. Drop down onto the small cliff below. Turn around and go into the tunnel. The shield will be on a body in the room ahead. Note: There will be an ambush of enemies, so you may want to clear the room first.
name: Coil Shield

hint: Dropped by the boss Demi-Human Queen Margot at the end of Volcano Cave north of Mt. Gelmir.
name: Jar Cannon

hint: Dropped at the end of the hallway in Volcano Manor after defeating Rykard. Video Location
name: My Thanks

hint: Eye Surcoat can be found on the ground after defeating Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy Boss.
name: Eye Surcoat

hint: Drop from Blackflame Monks
name: Blackflame Monk Gauntlets

hint: Where to Find Depraved Perfumer Carmaan Ashes  Located on a corpse in Volcano Manor that is near the top of Mt. Gelmir, west of Altus Plateau. Finding these ashes involves beginning the Volcano Manor questline. Once inside the manor talk to Lady Tanith and agree to receive the drawing-room key which opens the doors in the hallway to the right. In the room opposite to a bolted shut door is an illusionary wall that hides the secret passage leading you around the manor's perimeter into the locked room that hides the corpse holding the ashes.  Video Location
name: Depraved Perfumer Carmaan Ashes

hint: Drops from Blackflame Monks
name: Blackflame Monk Armor

hint: Where to Find Man-Serpent Ashes  Located by the Volcano Manor site of grace in the Volcano Manor legacy dungeon on Mt. Gelmir. The ashes can be found in a room on a corpse surrounded by red candles and three enemies inside the large open room with two large sets of stairs, spiral pillars, and a large egg guarded by a man-serpent at the top.  Video Location
name: Man-Serpent Ashes

hint: Dropped by the Abductor Virgins Field Boss in Volcano Manor's underground, down from the Subterranean Inquisition Chamber site of grace. Easily reachable once you have the Temple of Eiglay Grace. Video Location
name: Inquisitor's Girandole

hint: Drop from Blackflame Monks
name: Blackflame Monk Greaves

hint: On a rocky ledge at Volcano Manor, Altus Plateau.       To reach the Crimson Tear Scarab, start from the Temple of Eiglay site of grace.           Route A: If you have activated the wooden elevator in the tower to the north, ride it to the top. After the elevator reaches the top, exit the room via the doorway to the northeast. Look over the railing to the south; there is a ledge below with a corpse.      Route B: Take the stone lift south of the Temple of Eiglay grace. Walk out to the balcony, and jump down to a rocky ledge to the east. Follow the path past Burning Slugs up to the top. Head northwest to the nearest tower, where an Abductor Virgin appears. Jump into the open window of the tower. Exit the room through a door to the right. Right before the Man-Serpent wielding a burning sword, look over the railing to the south to see a ledge with a corpse.          The Crimson Tear Scarab can be looted from that corpse. Elden Ring Interactive
name: Crimson Tear Scarab

hint: Acquired from defeating the Godskin Noble at the Volcano Manor  Video Location
name: Noble Presence

hint: From the Prison Town Church site of grace, exit the building and turn right, walking west until dropping down onto the rooftop. Immediately turn left, facing south, and safely drop down onto the rocky ground below. Once there, continue downhill to the east, and drop down to a big roof to the southwest. From there, jump to the rocky ground to the northwest, and continue onward to the graveyard. The Smoldering Shield is found here on a corpse.  Video Location
name: Smoldering Shield

hint: Through and Through can be found on an Invisible Scarab just outside Volcano Manor in the Altus Plateau. Strike the Scarab when the footsteps are near and you will acquire this Ash of War.
name: Ash of War: Through and Through

hint: By Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy Site of Grace in Volcano Manor: Progress Tanith's quest to the point where she's feasting on Rykard's corpse, then kill her. Tanith's Knight will invade shortly thereafter, and will drop this Aspects of the Crucible: Breath when killed.  Video Location
name: Aspects of the Crucible: Breath

hint: The Commoner's Headband is found on a corpse in Volcano Manor.       After the Temple of Eiglay site of grace, take the elevator up and jump off the outside balcony into the area below. Follow the path past the Abductor Virgin into the window of the manor. Continue until you are on a walkway overlooking the lake the lava lake with Serpent statues on the right side. The Commoner's Headpiece is on a corpse on the head of the second statue.
name: Commoner's Headband

hint: Drops from Blackflame Monks
name: Blackflame Monk Hood

hint: From the Temple of Eiglay Grace, exit the northeast door that opens to the west. Enter the small building that only contains a lift, and ride it up. Continue straight across the big hallway northwest. (This requires having unlocked the lift. Take the "long way" from the Temple to the big hallway, past the lava pools, if the lift isn't unlocked.) Continue down into the building to the north; the first room is empty, and the room you enter through a doorway, facing east, looks like a throne room. Go up one flight of stairs on either side, and turn around and continue going up a second flight of stairs to the western door. There will be an imp statue in the next room. Carefully jump down the cages, and be wary of the sorcerer enemy halfway down, and the crawling enemies at the bottom. The Ashes of War are in the room past the door to the northeast.   Video Location tl;dr: Behind the Imp Seal in the hall where various nobles are praying. You can access this area after kiling the Godskin Noble.
name: Ash of War: Royal Knight's Resolve

hint: The Gelmir Glintstone Staff is an uncommon drop from the Man-Serpent Sorcerer in the throne room above Volcano Manor.  It is recommended that players use a Silver-Pickled Fowl Foot for each run up to the throne room to boost item discovery from killing enemies as well as unlock the lift leading from the Temple of Eiglay Site of Grace to the throne room. Due to the relatively low drop rate, it may take multiple runs and teleports back to the site of grace to see the staff drop.
name: Gelmir Glintstone Staff

hint: Base Talisman: Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant at the eastern side of Weeping Peninsula, for  1,500 Runes.   +1 Variant: Found in Volcano Manor. Go to the Prison Town Church Site of Grace, go out and through the little town as if you were progressing through the manor as normal, and use a Stonesword Key to go through the fog gate. An Abductor Virgin is there, but you can easily run up the stairs to the level above, where the talisman is on a dead body. Video Location  +2 Variant, SPOILER WARNING: Can be found just southwest of the Leyndell, Ashen Capital Site of Grace,  by dropping down the open sewer grate to the beam below. Video Location
name: Crimson Amber Medallion +1

hint: Dropped by Godskin Noble at Volcano Manor. Video Location
name: Godskin Stitcher

hint: Found in Volcano Manor near the Guest Hall grace. Head left from the grace, then left again, taking the stairs to the next floor. Head outside and take the ladder to your left onto the roof. Head south to the back of the roof and jump off the west side onto a ledge. The Albinauric Staff, along with the Albinauric Mask, is inside a room with an Omenkiller.  Video Location
name: Albinauric Staff

hint: Possible drop from Man-Serpent enemies wielding the orange glowing Magma Blade at Volcano Manor.       Two of the Serpents can be easily accessed by going up the wooden elevator outside of the building to the North of the Temple of Eiglay Site of Grace: one enemy down the hallway, the other through the first archway to the right.
name: Magma Blade

hint: Reward for killing phantom Inquisitor Ghiza in Volcano Manor.  Video Location
name: Ghiza's Wheel

hint: Found on a corpse in a cell near the Omenkiller enemy in the town below the Prison Town Church Site of Grace in Volcano Manor.  Video Location
name: Erdtree Seal

hint: The Black Dumpling Helm can be obtained by killing the First Generation Albinaurics found at Volcano Manor and in the lower Leyndell Royal Capital who wear it.
name: Black Dumpling

hint: Start from the waygate that teleports you to the Audience Pathway before Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy. Head back and head upstairs. Use two Stonesword Keys and pass thorough the fog gate. After entering the hanging cage room, turn right and drop down. Follow the path and you will find the Dagger Talisman on a corpse.
name: Dagger Talisman

hint: Held by a corpse on the left as you enter the boss chamber of Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy.  If the players picks up the Serpent-Hunter in the middle of being summoned. After picking up the spear and getting summoned, a second copy of the Serpent-Hunter would appear at the original location upon returning to their world, allowing you to dual wield the Serpent-Hunters.  This weapon will not be respawned on a New Game Plus. The only way to respawn the weapon is to discard it. After discarding the weapon and reloading your location, the weapon would reappear at its original location provided that Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy was still alive.  If the player manages to beat Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy without picking up the Serpent-Hunter, the weapon disappears.  Video Location
name: Serpent-Hunter

hint: Found in Volcano Manor near the Guest Hall grace. Head left from the site of grace, then left again, taking the stairs to the next floor. Head outside and take the ladder to your left onto the roof. Go to the back of the roof and jump off the right side to be taken to a room with the Albinauric Mask.   Video Location
name: Albinauric Mask

hint: The Man-Serpent's Shield is an uncommon drop from shield-wielding man-serpents in Volcano Manor.  A place to farm the Man-Serpent's Shield is near the Guest Hall site of grace. Leave the building using the back door, and there's one Man-Serpent patrolling the area (10-second runs).
name: Man-Serpent's Shield

hint: Bloodhound Claws can be dropped by a Lesser Bloodhound Knight in the basement of the Volcano Manor.  Video Location
name: Bloodhound Claws

hint: Can be found in the Wyndham Catacombs in a room sealed by an Imp Statue, requires a Stonesword Key.   Note: This is not in the underground passage way in the ruins that also takes one Stonesword Key to enter. Make sure you go all the way up the hill through all of the ruins, up past the cathedral-esque building. In the side of the mountain is where you'll find the actual Catacombs
name: Lightning Scorpion Charm

hint: Where to find Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook [1]  Found in Wyndham Catacombs on a body in the room behind the rusted bars in the sewers. Can be reached by going under the raising floor in the room with the spike ceiling.
name: Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook [1]

hint: Drops from the Black Blade Kindred, who stands in front of the Beastial Sanctum.
name: Gargoyle's Blackblade

hint: Bestial Sanctum: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him the third Deathroot.
name: Bestial Vitality

hint: Bestial Sanctum: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him the 6th Deathroot.
name: Stone of Gurranq

hint: Bestial Sanctum: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him the 8th Deathroot.
name: Gurranq's Beast Claw

hint: Dropped by Black Blade Kindred at the Bestial Sanctum.
name: Gargoyle's Black Halberd

hint: Gurranq will reward the player with this after turning in their 7th Deathroot.
name: Beastclaw Greathammer

hint: Location: Cinquedea can be found at the bottom of the exterior structure of the Bestial Sanctum, near a broken rat corpse statue.  To reach this spot, go to the west cliff outside the sanctum and travel down a series of roots and platforms. Jump down to the outlying branch and continue downward using the ledges and pillars. You can use Rainbow Stones to figure out where to fall from next.   Once you reach the lowest level, searching this area will grant you this dagger as well as the Dragoncrest Shield Talisman.
name: Cinquedea

hint: Base talisman: Bestial Sanctum: Found on the bottom level of the structure below the surrounding cliffs.  +1 Variant: Sainted Hero's Grave: Can be found in a locked imp's room, behind a Stonesword Key fog wall (not the first one you encounter; the Crimson Seed Talisman is located behind that one). When you reach the area with the big axes stomping the ground, you need to get on the first one and jump on the ledge on the left wall. There are multiple Putrid Corpses along this path and in the room with the fog doors, alongside a pair of Wraith Callers. Once you've dealt with them and opened the fog door, there are a final pair of Putrids watching over the talisman.    +2 Variant: Crumbling Farum Azula: Looted from a corpse on floating chunk of debris in the northern section, between Dragon Temple Lift and Dragon Temple Rooftop. Video Location
name: Dragoncrest Shield Talisman

hint: Bestial Sanctum: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him the second Deathroot.
name: Bestial Sling

hint: Bestial Sanctum: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him the fifth Deathroot.
name: Beast Claw

hint: Bestial Sanctum: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him the fourth Deathroot.
name: Ash of War: Beast's Roar

hint: Given by Gurranq Beast Clergyman after feeding him a Deathroot. Elden Ring
name: Clawmark Seal

hint: Base talisman: Dropped by the Beastman of Farum Azula in Groveside Cave in Limgrave.  +1 Variation: Found at Leyndell Royal Capital, head up the elevator leading towards the Grand Lift of Rold, on the ground against a column.  +2 Variation: Dropped by the Beastman of Farum Azula in Dragonbarrow Cave in eastern Dragonbarrow.
name: Flamedrake Talisman +2

hint: Obtained by defeating the Putrid Avatar near the second Minor Erdtree in Caelid.
name: Stonebarb Cracked Tear

hint: In the back of Dragonbarrow Cave. From the entrance, take a left into the Giant Bear's patrol route. Search that side of the cave to find the talisman at the end, on a corpse.
name: Bull-Goat's Talisman

hint: Dropped by Putrid Avatar next to the Minor Erdtree north of Fort Faroth in Caelid.

hint: By defeating the Godskin Apostle at the bottom of the Divine Tower of Caelid.

hint: By defeating the Godskin Apostle at the bottom of the Divine Tower of Caelid.

hint: The Godskin Apostle Hood Helm can be found by defeating the Godskin Apostle at the bottom of the Divine Tower of Caelid.
name: Godskin Apostle Hood

hint: Divine Tower of Caelid: Found in a chest behind the Godskin Apostle's boss arena after defeating him.
name: Godslayer's Greatsword

hint: Base talisman: Found on a corpse lying on the stairs leading to the lift going up to the Deep Siofra Well.+1 variant: Found on a corpse in the middle and at the lowest floor of a ruin in Nokron, Eternal City. This is above an earlier area in Siofra River. To get there, head southeast from Ancestral Woods Site of Grace, and follow the brick path until it ends at a cliff. Turn left and follow the cliff edge as far as you can, then carefully drop onto the ruins roof. Follow this raised pathway northeast until you reach a square open platform. Descend carefully, and the talisman is found on a corpse in the center.
name: Clarifying Horn Charm

hint: On dead body under a Golem, west of Deep Siofra Well, Caelid. Video Location
name: Spiked Palisade Shield

hint: Caelid: Appears at edge of a cliff after you've looted the "Redmane" Painting in Sellia, Town of Sorcery. You'll find it down the cliff on a plateau south east of the Eastern Minor Erdtree in Caelid. This is right below Fort Faroth. The Erdtree is located in the Caelid subregion called Dragonbarrow. Once you've made your way down, walk to the edge (without the pillars) and you'll briefly see the spirit of a painter, he'll vanish and the Ash of War will appear in his place.  If you use the spiritspring here and jump <just past> the spiritspring (on the very edge of its radius), then double jump just before you hit the little jar on the edge of the cliff, you can safely land at the bottom or close to it.  From the Fort Faroth Grace. Head NE and jump down onto the spiritspring at the base of the Erdtree. If you walk SE to the cliff to the right of the pot and broken pot next to each other, there are a series of roots you can jump down to reach this ledge.  There is no need to aggro the strong golem at the West to get this drop, although it can be safely engaged from the top of the last tree before dropping onto the platform. It only drops about 5000 runes and is guarding a corpse with a Rune Arc.
name: Ash of War: Rain of Arrows

hint: Fort Faroth: Found on a corpse by dropping down the opening from the roof and exploring around the wooden walkways. From the Fort Faroth Site of Grace, run into the fort and pass the bats and harpies. Climb up the ladder and make a right, down the scaffolding. Run past the first hole on the floor; jump down the second one. Run northeast, being careful of the rat behind the boxes to the left. Make a running jump where the wall ends, to another platform, where two rats will be waiting. Past them and down the ladder is the talisman.
name: Radagon's Soreseal

hint: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab along the cliffside northeast of the Minor Erdtree in Dragonbarrow;from Lenne's Rise, on the high ground almost directly west of the Rise and west side of the bridge.
name: Bestial Constitution

hint: Starting Equipment for the Samurai Class  Sold by the Isolated Merchant in Dragonbarrow for 1,000  Runes.
name: Land of Reeds Greaves

hint: Starting Equipment for the Samurai Class  Sold by the Isolated Merchant in Dragonbarrow for 1,000  Runes.
name: Land of Reeds Gauntlets

hint: Sold by Isolated Merchant in northwest Caelid.
name: Note: Hidden Cave

hint: Starting Equipment for the Samurai Class.  Sold by the Isolated Merchant in Dragonbarrow for 1,000  Runes.
name: Land of Reeds Helm

hint: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found on the cliffs northwest of the Isolated Merchant's Shack in Dragonbarrow.
name: Ash of War: Sky Shot

hint: Dropped by the Bell Bearing Hunter that spawns at the Isolated Merchant's Shack in Dragonbarrow. Like the other spawn locations he will only spawn at night. He will spawn right outside the shack where the merchant usually sits.
name: Gravity Stone Peddler's Bell Bearing

hint: Starting Equipment for the Samurai Class.  Sold by the Isolated Merchant in Dragonbarrow for 1,500  Runes.
name: Land of Reeds Armor

hint: Sold by the Isolated Merchant in Dragonbarrow for  1200 Runes.
name: Beast-Repellent Torch

hint: Sold by the Isolated Merchant in Dragonbarrow for 4,000  Runes.  To get these early from Gate Front: Follow the road East, cross the bridge, then take the left road at the intersection and follow it all the way to Third Church of Marika. (Grab Wondrous Physick to save yourself some time). Behind the church in some bushes is a teleporter, take it to go to Bestial Sanctum. From the Sanctum head South, cross the bridge with a dragon, then go further South for a checkpoint at Fort Faroth (later you can grab Radagon Soreseal here and kill the big dragon outside with your cestus for 90k with a golden foot. From Fort Faroth simply go West and slightly North, following the road all the way to Isolated Merchant Shack.
name: Spiked Caestus

hint: Dropped by a Night's Cavalry at the bridge in front of the Lenne's Rise tower, in Dragonbarrow.
name: Ash of War: Bloodhound's Step

hint: A Starting Equipment Piece for the Vagabond Class.  Sold by the Nomadic Merchant located in eastern Mountaintops of the Giants for 1,000  Runes.
name: Vagabond Knight Gauntlets

hint: A Starting Equipment Piece for the Vagabond Class.   Sold by the Nomadic Merchant located in eastern Mountaintops of the Giants for 1,500  Runes.
name: Vagabond Knight Armor

hint: Where to find Missionary's Cookbook [7]  Sold by the Nomadic Merchant located in eastern Mountaintops of the Giants for 7,500  Runes. This Nomadic Merchant can be found in the Mountaintops of the Giants, south of Stargazer's Ruins. Players can reach his location by riding west of the ruins and following the cliffs around to the underside of the southern bridge.
name: Missionary's Cookbook [7]

hint: Mountaintops of the Giants: Start at the Foot of the Forge site of grace and move to the most north-eastern part of that mountain, past the pot-throwing trolls and the giant Fingercreeper. The bubbletear is at the end of a narrow passage heading west from this point, along the northern cliff. Beware that the passage is infested with small Fingercreepers.
name: Crimsonwhorl Bubbletear

hint: A Starting Equipment Piece for the Vagabond Class.  Sold by the Nomadic Merchant located in eastern Mountaintops of the Giants for 1,000  Runes.
name: Vagabond Knight Helm

hint: In Mountaintops of the Giants. South of Whiteridge Road Grace. Inside a Fire Monk campsite, look for the scarab hanging on a tree. Elden Ring Interactive.
name: Ash of War: Prelate's Charge

hint: A Starting Equipment Piece for the Vagabond Class.  Sold by the Nomadic Merchant located in eastern Mountaintops of the Giants for 1,000  Runes.
name: Vagabond Knight Greaves

hint: Dropped by a Tibia Mariner on a ledge South of Castle Sol and North West of Snow Valley Ruins Overlook.
name: Helphen's Steeple

hint: On the frozen lake east of the Freezing Lake site of grace in the Mountaintops of The Giants, dropped by an invisible scarab.
name: Ash of War: Seppuku

hint: Can be found at the leftmost dead tree next to three Thorn Sorcerers just before the long stone bridge with the Golem Archer at the end in the Mountaintops of the Giants region.
name: Briars of Punishment

hint: Dropped by Fire Monks.       In Mountaintops of the Giants, Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave. From the site of grace, go down the stairs to the left. Avoid the first Fire Monk located immediately down the stairs and proceed  to the right through a hidden path. Jump down and avoid or kill the imps with the golden light and then proceed forward. The Fire Monk that can drop the Flameblade is to the right in the corríddor with the flame trap. You can use Margit’s Shackle to disarm the trap.
name: Monk's Flameblade

hint: Base Talisman: Lakeside Crystal Cave: After defeating the Bloodhound Knight.  +1 Variant: Castle Sol: Found on a corpse hanging by a wooden ledge above the southern walls of the castle. This area is accessed by climbing a ladder behind the church in the southeast and following the walls west. Beware the very powerful dual sword knight guarding the area. He can teleport behind you and perform long combos.  +2 Variant: Lunar Estate Ruins: Found in a treasure chest in an underground room northwest of the ruins. Look for an Imp Statue pressed up against the wall. This requires one Stonesword Key. The stairs are also concealed by an illusory floor. Simply hit the floor next to the Imp Statue to reveal the stairs.
name: Cerulean Amber Medallion +1

hint: Dropped by Commander Niall upon defeat at Castle Sol in the Mountaintops of the Giants.
name: Veteran's Prosthesis

hint: Castle Sol: Found at the altar of the church in the southeast section of the castle.
name: Eclipse Shotel

hint: Can be found on the top of the big rock just south east the Church of Repose (in Mountaintops of the Giants), accessible via the spirit spring further south from the Giant Crow.
name: Ash of War: Troll's Roar

hint: Found in a corpse just outside the First Church of Marika in Mountaintops of the Giants.It is right in front of the Entrance. Since it is snowy the white glowing item is hard to spot.
name: Somberstone Miner's Bell Bearing [3]

hint: Dropped by Bloody Finger Okina at Mountaintops of the Giants.
name: Okina Mask

hint: Mountaintops of the Giants: Found at the altar. You can arrive by walking on the chain from the enemy encampment.
name: Map (Mountaintops of the Giants, East)

hint: Dropped by Bloody Finger Okina   Okina invades near the Church of Repose, found in the Eastern region of Mountaintops of the Giants.
name: Rivers of Blood

hint: Dropped by Black Blade Kindred at the Mountaintops of the Giants.
name: Gargoyle's Black Axe

hint: From the Forbidden Lands site of grace, turn back and head towards the elevator. Face southwest before activating the elevator, and then watch for an opening to jump off into. The Official's Attire is on the corpse in this hidden hallway, alongside Blade of Calling.
name: Official's Attire

hint: From the Forbidden Lands site of grace, turn back and head towards the elevator. Face southwest before activating the elevator, and then watch for an opening to jump off into. The Blade of Calling is on the table in the room at the end of this hall.
name: Blade of Calling

hint: Dropped by Black Blade Kindred at the Forbidden Lands just before Mountaintops of the Giants.
name: Gargoyle's Black Blades

hint: Dropped by a Night's Cavalry northeast the Forbidden Lands Grace in the Forbidden Lands. Elden Ring.
name: Ash of War: Phantom Slash

hint: Go up the Grand Lift of Rold from Leyndell, along the path.
name: Map (Mountaintops of the Giants, West)

hint: Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave: The entire set is dropped by the Ancient Hero of Zamor Boss at the end of this dungeon.
name: Zamor Mask

hint: Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave: Found on a corpse inside a sealed room near the beginning, in front of the Site of Grace. The room requires one Stonesword Key to unlock.
name: Flame, Protect Me

hint: Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave: The entire set is dropped by the Ancient Hero of Zamor Boss at the end of this dungeon.
name: Zamor Legwraps

hint: Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave: Found on a corpse at the end of a large hall locked behind an Imp Statue. This hall is directly above the room with the flamethrower pillar.
name: Cranial Vessel Candlestand

hint: Inside Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave.  In the large hall with the Troll, drop down from either side of the platform into a room with a Fire Prelate. Defeat it and check the right side of the room for a corpse holding the seal.  Alternatively, you can reach this room by descending the lift and sending it back up. Pull the lever in the alcove to the right and then enter the small space in the raised lift to descend further down. In the next hall, sprint past the Lesser Burial Watchdog and turn left. Climb the ladder at the end of this path.
name: Giant's Seal

hint: Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave: Dropped by the Ancient Hero of Zamor boss found at the end of the dungeon.
name: Zamor Curved Sword

hint: Dropped by the sword wielding Watchdogs in the Mountaintops of the Giants.  Giants' Mountaintop Catacombs: This dungeon is located East past the Zamor Ruins grace. Follow the normal progression path until you see a group of  enemies and a Fire Prelate. Then double back to your right to find the entrance.Once you enter the dungeon, you will eventually come across a lift. Take the lift down, and then trigger the lift but quickly get off. Another lift will rise up from underneath and by taking that new lift down, you will enter the area with Two Watchdogs as well as other various enemies. The second Watchdog can drop it.  Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave: This dungeon can be reached by heading West of the Giants Grave Post site of Grace (just past the guardians garrison), and jumping over a small ravine.After entering the Dungeon heading down a short flight of stairs, a Fire Monk will approach from your right. Head right down the hall where the Fire Monk approached from and peer over the windows.  There will be a place to drop down. The Watchdog enemy in this room must be led into the light before defeating, but note that it enters a Vulnerable State after entering the light.  Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs: One sword-wielding Watchdog can be found guarding the Imp Head (Elder), which has a chance to drop the sword.
name: Watchdog's Greatsword

hint: Where to Find Fire Monk Ashes  Looted from a chest in the Giants' Mountaintop Catacombs:  Descend the first lift you find and then step on the plate again to send it back up. When fully raised, there is a second platform on the lift that will take you to the lowest levels of the catacombs. Continue through this path past two frost breath traps. The spell is found in a chest behind the second trap.
name: Fire Monk Ashes

hint: Dropped by mini-boss NPC Chief Guardian Arghanthy inside Guardians' Garrison in Mountaintops of the Giants.
name: One-Eyed Shield

hint: Given as a reward for solving the puzzle of the Sorcerer Painting. Travel north-west from the Stargazer's Ruins to the bridge, leading north. At the center of the bridge, on the east side, is a lip with a ghost sitting in a chair. Speak to the ghost of the painter to receive the Greathood.

hint: The bell bearing is found in Zamor Ruins in the Mountaintops of the Giants area. The chest is in a cellar at the very SW tip of the ruins, down one flight of stairs. From the Zamor Ruins grace site, head straight south using Torrent to jump the cliff, past a white bird, then it's just east after passing the tallest building ruin. Standing on the west cliff, it can be obtained with stealth by sneaking behind the guard.
name: Smithing-Stone Miner's Bell Bearing [3]

hint: Possible drop from Fire Prelate wielding it north of Giants' Mountaintop Catacombs entrance (northeast of  Zamor Ruins, just before the long narrow bridge).

hint: Dropped by a Rotten Duelist in the Consecrated Snowfield. From the site of grace, head west to reach an open graveyard with a Rotten Duelist. He drops the Rotten Duelist Helm as well as the Rotten Battle Hammer.

hint: Where to find Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [23]Found in Consecrated Snowfield: From the Consecrated Snowfield Site of Grace make your way directly north until you reach three noblemen in the middle of the road. A few feet in front of the trio will be the corpse of a nobleman holding a torch. The cookbook will be on said corpse.

hint: Map for all of Consecrated Snowfield: find it by following the road north past the snowstorm until you go down and cross a frozen river, then you will spot the map pillar ahead. Elden Ring.

hint: Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree: Found in a chest by the inner wall guarded by 3 Lesser Crystallians. From the Elphael Inner Wall site of grace, head down the steps and jump up on the rubble to your left. You can engage the Lesser Crystallians one by one by luring them over the rubble and into the hallway. Video Location
name: Rotten Crystal Sword

hint: Can be dropped by Lesser Crystalian enemies located within Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree       2 of them can be found in the room just next to the Elphael Inner Wall site of grace.           A consistent strategy is to lure one of them out with any throwable item, projectile weapon or spell, then use a striking-type weapon of your choice to fish for backstabs, followed with a charged heavy attack as they rise from the ground. After several critical or heavy blows the Lesser Crystalian will crack and become easy to stunlock with regular attacks.            Best way to farm is to go to the one at the Elphael Inner Wall, use the Fallingstar Beast Jaw +9 Weapon Art and kill it without passing over the tree root and aggroing the spearmen. Takes a few tries to get the drop, but no skill required.
name: Rotten Crystal Spear

hint: Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree: Found on an altar in a sealed room in the southeast lower levels. This room requires a Stonesword Key to unlock.   From the Prayer Room Site of Grace, move through the door to the north, and cross over to the walkway that has the Erdtree Avatar. Head to the southern end of the walkway, then jump down the western side, jumping down once again to reach the sealed door.  Alternatively, if you're feeling up for it, from the Elphael Inner Wall Site of Grace: leave the area through the eastern door and head down the ladder to the southeast. After going through the arch, turn right and follow the path, circling the city until you get to the imp statue. Be careful of enemies along the way, and inside the room as you pick up the talisman.  Video Location
name: Marika's Soreseal

hint: Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree: Found atop a bell tower. From the Prayer Room site of grace, walk forward into the Haligtree. Not far from the Prayer Room, you will see a Haligtree Soldier sitting down. Before the soldier is a ledge to the right you can walk out on, attached to a tower. Walk on this connector all the way to the tower. Drop down on the tower's ledge, and walk this outer rim to the opposite side. There will be a ladder that takes you up to the sword.  Alternatively, if you've already unlocked the Haligtree Roots site of grace, simply take the elevator in the adjacent room with the Scarlet Aeonia bloom (not the one in Malenia's boss room). After the elevator stops, get out, walk around the tower and find the ladder. It will take you up to the sword.   Video Location
name: Miquellan Knight's Sword

hint: Dropped by the Lesser Crystalian mage in the first section of Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree  Dropped by the Lesser Crystalian mage guarded by 2 Lesser Crystalian Lancers, just next to the Elphael Inner Wall Site of Grace
name: Rotten Crystal Staff

hint: Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree: Found in a chest on an elevated platform inside the large building in the northeast, guarded by several Pests. Video LocationThis platform can be reached by heading through the eastern exit from the Drainage Channel Site of Grace, and then navigating across the branches and concrete beams to reach the roof of the building. (See roof below)While there are many branches and beams to traverse, the path is fairly linear. Once on the roof, you'll see two holes in the roof's surface and peering through the hole, you'll see joists where you can land on.Land on the joists (you can go through either hole), and immediately shield, as you'll be attacked by pests. Make your way over the western end of the room (where the pests are attacking from) where the chest is located.
name: Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman

hint: Elphael, Brace of The Haligtree: From the Prayer Room grace, head out onto the eastern walkway and drop down one level by using the roofs on the right. There is a sealed treasure room just under the Prayer Room that requires a Stonesword Key to unlock. The chest containing the spell is inside.  Video Location
name: Triple Rings of Light

hint: Has a 4% base chance to drop from one specific Haligtree Knight in the graveyard beside the church at the bottom of Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree. All other Haligtree Knights, regardless if they wield this Shield, will not drop it.       To reach the Knight, go to the Drainage Channel Site of Grace, head outside and follow the roots on your left. Drop down onto the first support beam (a flying buttress) that slopes down to the right. Halfway down the buttress, there is a branch to the left that you need to drop down to. Cross the branch and jump/fall onto another buttress. From here, you can fall to the ground directly while taking some fall damage, or jump to the church balcony first and drop from there. The knight can be found sitting underneath the buttress near it's base.    Alternatively, from the Haligtree Roots Site of Grace, turn around and go up the elevator. Once you reach the top, run straight until you're outside the Church. Then turn right, and right again once you get past the corner of the building to find the knight.
name: Haligtree Crest Greatshield

hint: The Blackflame Monk Amon Ashes can be found in the following location  Dropped by the Stray Mimic Tear boss located in the Hidden Path to the Haligtree. This boss is in the secret catacombs underneath the large staircase in the main hall, accessible by navigating a series of invisible walkways. See the dungeon page for details on how to reach the boss.
name: Blackflame Monk Amon Ashes

hint: Base talisman: Acquired by defeating Runebear at the end of the Earthbore Cave in the Weeping Peninsula.  Spelldrake Talisman +1: Sellia, Town of Sorcery: Found in a small room in the northwest section of town, right under the balcony containing the Staff of Loss. This room is initially sealed by a barrier that can be dispelled by lighting a brazier atop a tower in the southwest of town.  Spelldrake Talisman +2: Found in the secret catacombs underneath the Hidden Path to the Haligtree by turning right just before the Stray Mimic Tear's boss door, following the corridor up and taking the lift. The talisman can be found on a corpse in an alcove at the top. See the location's page for details on how to get to the catacombs.
name: Spelldrake Talisman +2

hint: Found in a chest in Hidden Path to the Haligtree. In the large central room, there is a broken section of railing. There, you can drop down to an invisible platform, and walk to a small room. The chest is past an Illusory Wall, behind the Grave Glovewort (9).  Tip for finding the way on the invisible bridge: Use either glowing stones, throwing knives, or arrows (fire or shining work the best).
name: Silver Scarab

hint: Dropped by the Putrid Avatar at the Minor Erdtree in the Consecrated Snowfield, east of Ordina, Liturgical Town.
name: Thorny Cracked Tear

hint: Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar that resides in Liurnia of the Lakes.  Dropped by the Putrid Avatar at the Minor Erdtree in the Consecrated Snowfield, east of Ordina, Liturgical Town.
name: Ruptured Crystal Tear (2)

hint: Base talisman: Can be found beyond the lowest ("Crumbling Lands") waygate of the Four Belfries. Go through the waygate, then jump down to the north, then jump down to the east (and if you can, use ranged attacks to kill the two beastmen below), then jump down again, then jump down (to the north) one more time.  +1 Variation: Can be found in Wyndham Ruins in the Mt. Gelmir region. The talisman is found inside a chest at the end of the area sealed by an Imp Statue; a Stonesword Key is required.   +2 Variation: Can be found in Miquella's Haligtree. Travel to the Haligtree Town Site of Grace and exit through the northwestern door. Then climb the ladder and turn around to jump southeast across the gap. The talisman will be located on a corpse at the base of a statue, guarded by a Misbegotten Warrior. Video Location
name: Pearldrake Talisman +2

hint: Where to Find Oracle Envoy Ashes  Miquella's Haligtree near Haligtree Town site of grace  From the Haligtree Town site of grace, ascend the eastern ladder and run up the large branch past the scarlet rot flowers and avoiding the bubbles from the Giant Envoy behind you. Jump down to the left to a small branch from some fungi.  From there approach and kill the Giant Envoy that was above you.  Then continue upwards to the east where one Giant Envoy, one large Envoy, and two envoys guard the ashes.  Video Location
name: Oracle Envoy Ashes

hint: Dropped by Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree upon defeat. Video Location
name: Loretta's Mastery

hint: Miquella's Haligtree. Southeast of the Haligtree Canopy site of grace. (At the top of the branch that the Giant Ants patrol, on a corpse behind an Oracle Envoy Giant.) Video Location
name: Envoy Crown

hint: Base talisman: Tombsward Cave, a small dungeon in the Weeping Peninsula: Located southeast of the Fourth Church of Marika. The medallion is obtained after defeating the boss, Miranda the Blighted Bloom.+1 Variant: Altus Plateau, south of the Outer Wall Battleground Site of Grace: You will hear Margit whisper, "I see you, Tarnished..."  to you before appearing on the road. Defeat him again and it will drop.  +2 Variant: Miquella's Haligtree: The closest site of grace is the Haligtree Town Plaza. Go south towards the roof with a dead body on it. For reference, the dead body is two stories above the talisman. Continue southeast, and jump down once. Jump across the gap, and then do an immediate 180 turn and make a running jump into the building below. It'll be in a chest guarded by Scarlet Rot Zombies. Video location
name: Viridian Amber Medallion +2

hint: Pratting Pate "My Beloved" can be found on Miquella's Haligtree, east from the Haligtree Canopy Site of Grace. It is two branches down from the Grace site.  Video Location  Prattling Pate "Hello"  Prattling Pate "Thank you"  Prattling Pate "Apologies"  Prattling Pate "Wonderful"  Prattling Pate "Please help"  Prattling Pate "Let's get to it"  Prattling Pate "You're beautiful"
name: Prattling Pate My Beloved

hint: Dropped by Giant Oracle Envoy. They are found in Miquella's Haligtree.   Beginning at Haligtree Canopy Site of Grace, head up the branch in front of you and take a left towards the three Oracle Envoys. Immediately after passing the second Oracle Envoy, turn right and jump off the mushroom that leads to another branch containing a large Oracle Envoy. Run past this enemy until you reach a cluster of mushrooms. Jump from here, down to the large branch containing the patrolling giant ants. Sneak past or fight your way through them (if you reset the area and immediately head along through this route, once you jump down onto the large branch, you should only have to deal with one Giant Ant) and head up the branch. This will take you directly to a lone Giant Oracle Envoy.  Alternative route can be taken from Haligree Town Site of Grace: go back and up the ladder, run up the wide branch, jump down from the third cluster of mushrooms onto the narrow branch to the left and then go left again to the first Envoy. Three timed rolls are needed for this part. Flask of Wondrous Physick with Opaline Hardtear and Opaline Bubbletear combined with Lord's Divine Fortification are a tremendous help. Up the branch with first Giant Oracle Envoy is the second one grouped with a Large Oracle Envoy and two Oracle Envoy's.
name: Envoy's Greathorn

hint: Dropped by Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree upon defeat. Video Location
name: Loretta's War Sickle

hint: Dropped by an invisible Teardrop Scarab in the Consecrated Snowfield, northwest of the Inner Consecrated Snowfield site of grace between the grace and Ordina, Liturgical Town. The scarab leaves glowing white tracks in the snow and is chased wherever it goes by a pack of five wolves.
name: Ash of War: White Shadow's Lure

hint: Yelough Anix Ruins: Found in a chest inside an underground treasure room in the central section of the ruins.        In a four walled ruins on the western side. Reachable by double jumping with Torrent from the central building with the sleeping giant.

hint: Consecrated Snowfield: Dropped by Astel, Stars of Darkness, found within Yelough Anix Tunnel.
name: Meteorite of Astel

hint: You can find the Drake Knight Set in Crumbling Farum Azula.   Travel to the Beside The Great Bridge site of grace and go in the opposite direction of the boss room. Go through the building and outside onto the balcony. From here, drop down to the Beastman with the big cleaver. Go along the bridge and call up the elevator. Ride the Elevator down and go Outside. The Drake Knight Set is on the left in a big chest.
name: Drake Knight Greaves

hint: Dropped by the Draconic Tree Sentinel in Crumbling Farum Azula.
name: Malformed Dragon Gauntlets

hint: Crumbling Farum Azula: On a corpse at the edge of the cliffs by the Tempest-Facing Balcony site of grace. Video Location
name: Somberstone Miner's Bell Bearing [4]

hint: Where to find Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook [4]  Can be acquired at Crumbling Farum Azula. From the Dragon Temple Lift site of Grace, do not take the lift. Instead head out into the undead courtyard and keep right. There is a series of collapsed archways and crumbled tower pieces stretching to the west to traverse. Platform over the tower pieces, and then pick up this book inside an enclosed area at the end. Two undead beastmen will attack you when you pick up the cookbook. Video Location
name: Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook [4]

hint: The Malformed Dragon Armor Chest Armor can be obtained from killing the Tree Sentinel up the stairs from the Beside the Great Bridge site of grace.
name: Malformed Dragon Armor

hint: Drops from Knight Bernahl upon death. If not killed before, he will eventually invade you at Crumbling Farum Azula, dropping the entire set with an altered version of the chest piece.  You can get this armor piece early by killing Knight Bernahl when you first encounter him at Warmaster's Shack.
name: Beast Champion Armor

hint: Found in a small church in Crumbling Farum Azula right before the Beside the Great Bridge Grace. Video location  If you have the elevator shortcut from the Grace, Beside the Great Bridge take the elevator back down, then take every right possible and it will be on a corpse next to the altar.  From the Dragon Temple Rooftop Site of Grace, drop down to the red rooftops and head east (right), then move south past that bird, running off the side (instead of using ladder) and head to the dragon, be wary of its red lightning and the birds... From the dragon head west (there is a Somber Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone to the east), take a breather at the sleeping beast, run past the standing beast and across the columns of the broken down building, Now head east (right) into the building, in front of that beast by the altar will be the Somberstone Miner's Bell Bearing [5]. Head south of that room(right) then east (left), pass the greatsword wielding beast into the room where an elevator to the northwest will take you to Beside the Great Bridge Grace.
name: Somberstone Miner's Bell Bearing [5]

hint: You can find the Drake Knight Set in Crumbling Farum Azula.  Travel to the Beside The Great Bridge site of grace and go in the opposite direction of the boss room. Go through the building and outside onto the balcony. From here drop down to the Beastman with the big cleaver. Go along the bridge and call up the elevator. Ride the Elevator down and go Outside. The Drake Knight Set is on the left in a big chest.
name: Drake Knight Armor

hint: Located at Stormveil Castle.  When you reach the main castle grounds where you fight the Lion Guardian, head inside the room with the armored statues, and through the arch doorway, to reach the Limgrave Tower Bridge Site of Grace. Specifically, you'll find the on a body that you can loot, just at the top of the first set of stairs, resting against a pillar on the left side.   Boltdrake Talisman +1: This more-powerful variant of the Boltdrake Talisman can be found in a storage shed inside the Old Altus Tunnel dungeon.   Boltdrake Talisman +2: Found on a corpse hanging off an opening in a tall tower south of the Dragon Temple Rooftop Site of Grace. Reaching this area is a bit complex:       You will first need to head southeast to the large plaza guarded by a stationary Farum Azula Dragon, which is constantly raining red lightning all around the area.    From here, look northeast, then drop down a series of cliffs to the east to reach the opening at the bottom of a large building.    Follow the linear path here to a balcony with a ladder leading up to a terrace. Mind the Banished Knights patrolling the area.    Directly in front of the ladder is a lift building; to your left is a chest with the Dragon Towershield. Take the lift up to a series of slopes leading to a hallway underneath the same bridge you crossed to get to the southeast plaza.    The passage ahead has a Crucible Knight fighting a couple of Beastmen. Fight your way through the hallway (or just run past the enemies) to reach a ladder at the end.    Climb up the ladder to reach an open window where the corpse holding the talisman can be found.      Boltdrake Talisman +2 Video Location, Crumbling Farum Azula
name: Boltdrake Talisman +2

hint: Dropped by Knight/Recusant Bernahl when defeated. You will find him at Warmaster's Shack or in Crumbling Farum Azula when he invades you. Video Location

When you reach the area with the big axes stomping the ground, you need to get on the first one and jump on the ledge on the left wall. hint: From the Cathedral of the Forsaken site of grace, made available after defeating Mohg, The Omen, attack the altar at the front of the boss room. It should lower itself revealing a new area. Continue through here until you are forced to parkour downwards using stone coffins as platforms. Near the bottom you will see a corpse that has an item on it. Carefully reach this platform and there will be an open area with more bodies and a tent. The Note can be looted off the ground after tent is destroyed. You can do that in 2 ways:- Around the corner is a shambling Nomad. Lure him out to the tent and get him to destroy it with his Inescapable Frenzy attack.- Quit-out while standing very close to tent and it will be destroyed after loading up.  Video Location
name: Note: Miquella's Needle

hint: Frenzied’s Cookbook [2] Is found nearest to the Cathedral of the Forsaken Site of Grace in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds below Leyndell, Royal Capital. Behind the altar in Mohg, the Omen's boss room is a hidden path which can be opened by attacking the altar behind the chest after the boss fight. Following the the hidden path, there are stairs down and will lead to collapsed rafters that you can cross; you can cross the path and follow the stairs down for a safer route, or drop directly below on second set of collapsed rafters. On the second set of rafters, you will need to drop down to the lowest set of them, and you will find Frenzied's Cookbook [2] on a sitting corpse.
name: Frenzied's Cookbook [2]

hint: Deeproot Depths: Dropped by a Lesser Runebear, in a cave behind a waterfall northeast of the Deeproot Depths Site of Grace.  This fight can be cheesed fairly easily using ranged weapons or spells. From the Across the Roots site of grace, head down the large tree branch going southwest until you reach the next separate large tree branch. Head southeast and then east as the branch curves, then drop down onto another branch going south. You should find a hole that will take you into a cave area that is above where the runebear sleeps. From here, none of the runebear's melee attacks can reach you.        Several players have experienced a bug in which the talisman does not drop from the runebear. The above method has the highest success rate for obtaining the talisman.
name: Prince of Death's Cyst

hint: Where to Find Mausoleum Soldier Ashes  Located at the base of a small dead tree at the edge of a cliff in the Deeproot Depths.From the The Nameless Eternal City site of grace located in the Deeproot Depths, go north until you reach the Mausoleum. From there, go north toward the cliff and follow the edge until you reach the northmost location possible.  Video Location
name: Mausoleum Soldier Ashes

Descend the tower and use the ledges on the bottom to reach the ring walkway. hint: Where to find Elden Stars:In the Deeproot Depths, head west from the Great Waterfall Crest grace until you reach some roots. Note that this is a different entrance than the one where the remains containing the spell is visible (with the ledge below it with two ants).Enter the cave and fight through the packs of Giant Ants until the end and  you'll find Elden Stars on a body facing the cave exit.

hint: Travel to the Seaside Ruins Site of Grace. Walk south a short distance along the edge of the cliff (just past the crumbling archway). Look down toward the beach below and look for the windstream. Hop on Torrent and simply walk off the edge. Travel north until you see a small cave opening in the cliff face.  Travel to the The First Step Site of Grace. and make your way down the cliff to the east (should lead to an area with bats and crucifixes). Continue south east towards a bunch of crumbling pillars. Line yourself up with the pillar that is standing on the beach. Then, run or walk off of the edge of the cliff and land on a small ledge on said pillar (do not jump as you will be blocked by the ledge at the same level as the cliff). Then, safely hop down to the beach and the entrance to the cave is on the bottom of the cliff. Haligdrake Talisman +1:  Leyndell Catacombs: Found on a corpse next to a Lesser Spirit-caller Snail. From the Leyndell Catacombs site of grace, head up the elevator in the southeast to find a room with 3 spirit crossbowmen. Look under the arch next to the stairs for an illusory wall. Hit it to dispel the illusion, and then hit the wall on the left to dispel another illusion. The corpse and snail are found in here.Haligdrake Talisman +2: Looted off a body in Mohgwyn Palace, found in a small cluster of graves near a watchful Giant Crow perched up high.
name: Haligdrake Talisman +2

Turn left and follow the cliff edge as far as you can, then carefully drop onto the ruins roof. Follow this raised pathway northeast until you reach a square open platform. Descend carefully, and the talisman is found on a corpse in the center.

(This is past a shortcut gate that needs to be opened first.) Turn right here to reach an open area, and immediately drop to your left. Follow the winding stairs down, then right to go through some hallways. If you keep moving in the same direction you will eventually reach the corpse past some basilisks.  Video Location

Go through the door and up the watery path, hugging the right wall, you'll encounter an ant enemy along the way and through the tunnel you'll see a T-Posing enemy with a scythe at the cliff. Continue hugging the right wall, and drop down safely down the ledges and up the path where the chest is located on the walkway behind the Malformed Star enemy. Be careful of the spells it fires at you, so you don't get knocked off the walkway.  Video Location

name: Gold Bracelets

hint: Goldmask's Rags can all be found on Goldmask's body after the completion of Brother Corhyn's questline. Head south from the Ashen Capital site of grace and go down the small path in the direction of the colosseum. Go past the plant enemies and stick to the left and you will find Goldmask. Loot the rune from him, and reset the area and return to find his set (Except for the Helmet) on his body.
name: Goldmask's Rags

hint: Gold Waistwrap can be found on Goldmask's body after the completion of Brother Corhyn's questline. Head south from the Ashen Capital site of grace and go down the small path in the direction of the colosseum. Go past the plant enemies and stick to the left and you will find Goldmask. Look the rune from him, and reset the area and return to find the rest of his set on his body.
name: Gold Waistwrap

hint: Found upon completion of Diallos's questline.  Can also be gained by killing Diallos in North Liurnia of the Lakes.
name: Diallos's Mask

hint: Obtained by buying Boiled Prawn from Blackguard Big Boggart
name: Spread Out

hint: Dropped by the merchant Blackguard Big Boggart upon defeat.   Dropped by the merchant Blackguard Big Boggart at the end of his questline.
name: Blackguard's Iron Mask

hint: Dropped by Blackguard Big Boggart.
name: Iron Ball

hint: The Omen Set can be found after killing the Dung Eater in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds at the Leyndell Royal Capital.
name: Omen Greaves

hint: The Omen Set can be found after killing the Dung Eater in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds at the Leyndell Royal Capital.
name: Omen Gauntlets

hint: The Omen Set can be found after killing the Dung Eater in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds at the Leyndell Royal Capital.
name: Omen Helm

hint: The Omen Set can be found after killing the Dung Eater in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds at Leyndell Royal Capital.
name: Omen Armor

hint: Dropped by killing Dung Eater in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds if you choose to kill him here.  Dropped by Dung Eater (NPC Invader) in the Capital Outskirts moat. He can be found in this location after releasing his corporeal body from his cell in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds and then reading his message at the Roundtable Hold.       If the sword is dropped and lost (i.e. if the Tarnished is killed by the giant death crab before picking it up) it can still be acquired by killing Dung Eater's corporeal body in the Sewer Gaol (where he will now be tied to a chair), he will not drop the sword if you complete his questline.
name: Sword of Milos

hint: Complete Fia's Questline, and defeat Lichdragon Fortissax. After the battle, you will be transported back to the Deeproot Depths, and Fia's Hood and Fia's Robe can be picked up at the base of Godwyn's corpse.
name: Fia's Hood

hint: Complete Fia's Questline, and defeat Lichdragon Fortissax. After the battle, Fia's Robe will be where she lays, along with her Helm - Fia's Hood.
name: Fia's Robe

hint: Received at the end of Hyetta's questline.
name: Frenzied Flame Seal

hint: Where to Find Latenna the Albinauric  Liurnia of the Lakes, Slumbering Wolf's Shack, found at the end of Lakeside Crystal Cave upon defeating the boss.  In order for Latenna to be friendly and become a spirit, one has to have the Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right), given to the player by Albus  at the Village of the Albinaurics.  Alternatively, Latenna may be found dead if one progressed too far and missed out her quest. For this instance, one can still obtain her spirit ashes at the same location by simply picking up the item, but her quest would no longer be doable.
name: Latenna the Albinauric

hint: Found below the Cathedral of Manus Celes after giving Ranni the Dark Moon Ring.  You obtain the Ring by progressing Ranni's Quest, which is complex and requires you to do quite a lot of content.  Video Location
name: Dark Moon Greatsword

hint: After the player confronts Blaidd during Ranni's questline, War Counselor Iji will have new dialogue available. Upon exhausting that and returning to the area again, his corpse can be found near his usual spot at the Road to the Manor grace site. Upon his anvil, the player will find Iji's Mirrorhelm as well as Iji's Bell Bearing.  Video Location
name: Iji's Mirrorhelm

hint: Received at the end of Rya's quest. Rya will still drop the talisman even if you gave her the Tonic of Forgetfulness: after completing the manor questlines, she'll be in the drawing room. Exhaust her dialogues, rest, and go back to her location. She will be gone, and the talisman will be dropped on the floor.  Video Location
name: Daedicar's Woe

hint: Found on Seluvis's body in Seluvis's Rise after reaching the end of Ranni's questline. Elden Ring Interactive
name: Preceptor's Trousers

hint: Found on Seluvis's body in Seluvis's Rise after reaching the end of Ranni's questline. Elden Ring Interactive  Video Location
name: Preceptor's Gloves

hint: Sold by Preceptor Seluvis at Seluvis's Rise, after completing steps of his questline.  Can be obtained post-mortem via Seluvis's Bell Bearing. (from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold)
name: Carian Phalanx

hint: Where to Find Finger Maiden Therolina Puppet  Can be bought from Preceptor Seluvis in Seluvis's Rise for 2 Starlight Shards, or received for free after confronting him.  Video Location
name: Finger Maiden Therolina Puppet

hint: Where to Find Nepheli Loux Puppet  Can be collected in Caria Manor from Pidia if Nepheli Loux drank Seluvis's Potion. After advancing Ranni's questline to the point where you give her the Fingerslayer Blade and she departs from Ranni's Rise, Seluvis will die. Now when you head down to revisit Pidia you will hear him pleading for his life from the puppets. After you arrive you'll find his corpse in the middle of three standing puppets (can't be attacked). His corpse has this puppet and Pidia's Ball Bearing. However if Nepheli didn't drink the potion, Dolores the Sleeping Arrow Puppet will be found instead.
name: Nepheli Loux Puppet

hint: Where to Find Dolores the Sleeping Arrow Puppet  Can be chosen from Preceptor Seluvis after finding his puppet collection in a hidden basement within the region, and having chosen to give Seluvis's Potion to Nepheli Loux.       If you chose a different puppet at the time, then you can purchase this one from him for 5 Star Shards afterwards.This shop is still available if you interact with his body should he die.      If Seluvis's Potion is given to anyone else other than Nepheli Loux then you can find this Spirit Ashes on the body of  Pidia after progressing Ranni's questline far enough for Seluvis to perish resulting in the puppets Pidia were given by Seluvis to turn against him. His corpse can be looted for this Ash and Pidia's Bell Bearing.
name: Dolores the Sleeping Arrow Puppet

hint: Found on Seluvis's body in Seluvis's Rise after reaching the end of Ranni's questline.  Video Location
name: Preceptor's Long Gown

hint: Found on Seluvis's body in Seluvis's Rise after reaching the end of Ranni's questline.  Video Location
name: Preceptor's Big Hat

hint: Where to Find Dung Eater Puppet   Sold by Seluvis after using Seluvis's Potion on the Dung Eater. Costs 5 Starlight Shards.
name: Dung Eater Puppet

hint: Obtained by giving Preceptor Seluvis the Amber Starlight after Seluvis tells you about his scheme.  Cannot be obtained after Seluvius' death (which occurs when the Fingerslayer Blade is given to Ranni the Witch)       This makes it the only Scorpion Charm you can lock yourself out of getting in a playthrough.
name: Magic Scorpion Charm

hint: Finish the sidequest given by Gowry in Caelid, then return to Millicent to receive the talisman.
name: Prosthesis-Wearer Heirloom

hint: Can be obtained by killing Millicent at the Windmill Heights Site of Grace after killing the Godskin Apostle there. This is the absolute earliest it can be obtained.  Killing her at any point after this will also make her drop this talisman, including when you are given the choice at the end of her questline between aiding or challenging her, and choose to challenge her. Upon killing her, you will automatically receive this talisman.  If you chose to aid her at the end of her quest line and successfully fend of her sisters, she will drop the Rotten Winged Sword Insignia instead and this talisman can no longer be obtained during this playthrough until a new NG+ cycle is started.
name: Millicent's Prosthesis

hint: Drops from Gowry after you kill him, only if he is crying about Millicent's death.  Completing Millicent's entire quest line, by slaying or helping her at the end, will put Gowry in the "crying" state.Killing her earlier will also get Gowry into this state.
name: Flock's Canvas Talisman

hint: Given by Recusant Bernahl at Volcano Manor after completing his request.   Video Location
name: Gelmir's Fury

hint: Awarded by Tanith at Volcano Manor, after completing the third letter quest. This requires you to visit the Mountaintops of the Giants, to invade and defeat Juno Hoslow, Knight of Blood.   Juno Hoslow's invade rune can be found in the northern Mountaintops of the Giants, east of Shack of the Lofty.  Video Location
name: Taker's Cameo

hint: Rewarded by Tanith for completing Volcano Manor's first assassination quest.  Found in Drawing Room of Volcano Manner if first assassination quest is done after dissolving the faction by defeating Rykard  Video Location
name: Magma Shot

hint: Looted from the corpse of Tanith after attacking her and defeating the summoned Tannith's Knight near the Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy Site of Grace in Volcano Manor, Altus Plateau.
name: Consort's Robe

hint: Looted from the corpse of Tanith after attacking her and defeating the summoned Tannith's Knight near the Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy site of grace in Volcano Manor, Altus Plateau.
name: Consort's Mask

hint: Given as a reward for completing the second letter quest in Volcano Manor from Tanith.  Video Location.
name: Serpentbone Blade
